author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: The best part of being a mom to me is the unconditional love. I have never felt a love as pure, a love that's as rewarding.
author: Monica Denise Brown

quote: Every job is good if you do your best and work hard. A man who works hard stinks only to the ones that have nothing to do but smell.
author: Laura Ingalls Wilder

quote: A person who has been punished is not less inclined to behave in a given way; at best, he learns how to avoid punishment.
author: B. F. Skinner

quote: Yes'm, old friends is always best, 'less you can catch a new one that's fit to make an old one out of.
author: Sarah Orne Jewett

quote: Choose your corner, pick away at it carefully, intensely and to the best of your ability and that way you might change the world.
author: Charles Eames

quote: The patient's autonomy always, always should be respected, even if it is absolutely contrary - the decision is contrary to best medical advice and what the physician wants.
author: Jack Kevorkian

quote: I would say I'm a nice person, and I take pride in the fact that I treat everyone really well, so there's no reason for anyone to ever come at me because I only want the best for everybody else.
author: Miley Cyrus

quote: Life is short and if you're looking for extension, you had best do well. 'Cause there's good deeds and then there's good intentions. They are as far apart as Heaven and Hell.
author: Ben Harper

quote: The optimist thinks this is the best of all possible worlds. The pessimist fears it is true.
author: J. Robert Oppenheimer

quote: He who knows best knows how little he knows.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: The best way to look stylish on a budget is to try second-hand, bargain hunting, and vintage.
author: Orlando Bloom

quote: I've only had two rules: Do all you can and do it the best you can. It's the only way you ever get that feeling of accomplishing something.
author: Colonel Sanders

quote: In any team sport, the best teams have consistency and chemistry.
author: Roger Staubach

quote: Everybody should be able to enjoy their life, because you only live once. So I just want to get it all out there and be the best role model that I can be, if people want to put me in that kind of predicament. I mean, I didn't ask to be a role model, because I'm not perfect.
author: ASAP Rocky

quote: Being in love is the best feeling on the planet. I really believe that love makes the world go round.
author: Sonam Kapoor

quote: Climate change is destroying our path to sustainability. Ours is a world of looming challenges and increasingly limited resources. Sustainable development offers the best chance to adjust our course.
author: Ban Ki-moon

quote: Doing the best at this moment puts you in the best place for the next moment.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: My siblings are my best friends.
author: America Ferrera

quote: Expect the best, Prepare for the worst.
author: Muhammad Ali Jinnah

quote: Perfection is impossible just strive to do your best.
author: Angela Watson

quote: The best thinking has been done in solitude. The worst has been done in turmoil.
author: Thomas A. Edison

quote: Remembering that you are going to die is the best way I know to avoid the trap of thinking you have something to lose. You are already naked. There is no reason not to follow your heart.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: I think the best thing about being pregnant would definitely have to be seeing just my belly grow and seeing, like, wow, there is, you know, something inside of me.
author: Tia Mowry

quote: I am an emotional person, and soccer is sheer emotion. For me, it is the best way to unwind.
author: Martin Winterkorn

quote: The only way to get the best of an argument is to avoid it.
author: Dale Carnegie

quote: Sometimes you get the best light from a burning bridge.
author: Don Henley

quote: Money is the best rule of commerce.
author: William Petty

quote: The best way to keep one's word is not to give it.
author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: Scouting rises within you and inspires you to put forth your best.
author: Juliette Gordon Low

quote: The best thing is to always keep honest people around, because when you have a bunch of yes men around that know that you're making a mistake but let you go on with it, that's when it ruins your mind state as an artist.
author: Kendrick Lamar

quote: I keep sailing on in this middle passage. I am sailing into the wind and the dark. But I am doing my best to keep my boat steady and my sails full.
author: Arthur Ashe

quote: Sincere and generous collaboration is the best way to fulfil the legitimate aspirations of each person and achieve great collective goals for the common good and the general interest.
author: Felipe VI of Spain

quote: But the person who scored well on an SAT will not necessarily be the best doctor or the best lawyer or the best businessman. These tests do not measure character, leadership, creativity, perseverance.
author: William Julius Wilson

quote: I think the most productive thing to do during times of change is to be your best self, not the best version of someone else.
author: Seth Godin

quote: I personally think my sister is so stunning without makeup. And she doesn't wear that much makeup because she has the best skin color.
author: Gigi Hadid

quote: The best work is not what is most difficult for you it is what you do best.
author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quote: In assisting his 'neighbour' every day to the best of his ability, and keeping truth, honesty, and kindness perpetually before him, the Boy Scout, with as little formality as possible, is pleasing God.
author: Robert Baden-Powell

quote: Throughout our lives, God's grace bestows temporal blessings and spiritual gifts that magnify our abilities and enrich our lives. His grace refines us. His grace helps us become our best selves.
author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf

quote: As long as you as an individual... can convince yourself that in order to move forward as best you can you have to be optimistic, you can be described as 'one of the faithful,' one of those people who can say, 'Well, look, something's going to happen! Let's just keep trying. Let's not give up.
author: Tom Hanks

quote: The best fiction is geared towards conflict. We learn most about our characters through tension, when they are put up against insurmountable obstacles. This is true in real life.
author: Sufjan Stevens

quote: I think the best way to have confidence is not to allow everyone else's insecurities to be your own.
author: Jessie J

quote: In every aspect of life, have a game plan, and then do your best to achieve it.
author: Alan Kulwicki

quote: I am a gentleman. My natural inclination is to be on my best behavior.
author: Joe Wilson

quote: Looking good is the best revenge.
author: Ivana Trump

quote: Fourth of July. My birthday is July first, and my best friend's birthday is July fifth, so it's always been a favorite holiday. It's all about having a cooler full of sodas, hot dogs, and just hanging out and shooting off firecrackers, being low-key, watching the fireworks.
author: Hilarie Burton

quote: The best liar is he who makes the smallest amount of lying go the longest way.
author: Samuel Butler

quote: The best scientists and explorers have the attributes of kids! They ask question and have a sense of wonder. They have curiosity. 'Who, what, where, why, when, and how!' They never stop asking questions, and I never stop asking questions, just like a five year old.
author: Sylvia Earle

quote: Perfectionism is not the same thing as striving to be our best. Perfectionism is not about healthy achievement and growth it's a shield.
author: Brene Brown

quote: Being in love is the best thing in my life.
author: Olivia Newton-John

quote: If you like an instrument that sings, play the saxophone. At its best it's like the human voice.
author: Stan Getz

quote: Under any circumstance, simply do your best, and you will avoid self-judgment, self-abuse and regret.
author: Don Miguel Ruiz

quote: Love is the best school, but the tuition is high and the homework can be painful.
author: Diane Ackerman

quote: Life is often compared to a marathon, but I think it is more like being a sprinter; long stretches of hard work punctuated by brief moments in which we are given the opportunity to perform at our best.
author: Michael Johnson

quote: The best part of being blonde is forgivable momentary lapses of common sense.
author: Caity Lotz

quote: There are people out there who hate me and who say I'm arrogant, vain, and whatever. That's all part of my success. I am made to be the best.
author: Cristiano Ronaldo

quote: When you're the best, you only want to surround yourself with the best.
author: Floyd Mayweather, Jr.

quote: I have always served the public to the best of my ability. Why? Because, like every other man, it is to my interest to do so.
author: Cornelius Vanderbilt

quote: Obviously, the highest type of efficiency is that which can utilize existing material to the best advantage.
author: Jawaharlal Nehru

quote: I do not need a trophy to tell myself that I am the best.
author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

quote: You can't run a government from one single person. What instead matters is that leadership be about gathering around extraordinary individuals and getting the best out of them.
author: Justin Trudeau

quote: When employees are happy, they are your very best ambassadors.
author: James Sinegal

quote: The best things in life are free - and $19.95.
author: Billy Mays

quote: The best luck of all is the luck you make for yourself.
author: Douglas MacArthur

quote: The best way to destroy the capitalist system is to debauch the currency.
author: Vladimir Lenin

quote: Surround yourself with good people. People who are going to be honest with you and look out for your best interests.
author: Derek Jeter

quote: I pray to start my day and finish it in prayer. I'm just thankful for everything, all the blessings in my life, trying to stay that way. I think that's the best way to start your day and finish your day. It keeps everything in perspective.
author: Tim Tebow

quote: During difficult times, it's best to cut down on sweets like cookies, cake and candy. Satisfy your sweet tooth with fruit to help prevent blood sugar dips and spikes.
author: Karen Salmansohn

quote: You may call God love, you may call God goodness. But the best name for God is compassion.
author: Meister Eckhart

quote: I paint self-portraits because I am so often alone, because I am the person I know best.
author: Frida Kahlo

quote: Like a good parent can't also be his child's best friend, a leader with authority requires some separation from subordinates.
author: Simon Sinek

quote: The pursuit, even of the best things, ought to be calm and tranquil.
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: I've got a long way to go to being the ultimate best, but I think my time is now. And I'm starting to enter my prime.
author: Kevin Durant

quote: My best personality trait that I think I'm very approachable. And my worst is that I can be moody.
author: Enrique Iglesias

quote: I have believed the best of every man. And find that to believe is enough to make a bad man show him at his best, or even a good man swings his lantern higher.
author: William Butler Yeats

quote: That best portion of a man's life, his little, nameless, unremembered acts of kindness and love.
author: William Wordsworth

quote: Difficult times often bring out the best in people.
author: Bernie Sanders

quote: Grow old with me! The best is yet to be.
author: Robert Browning

quote: Learn to say 'no' to the good so you can say 'yes' to the best.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: Having an aim is the key to achieving your best.
author: Henry J. Kaiser

quote: Remember, always give your best. Never get discouraged. Never be petty. Always remember, others may hate you. But those who hate you don't win unless you hate them. And then you destroy yourself.
author: Richard M. Nixon

quote: The definition of swagger, in my opinion, is you have to have that arrogance, that confidence that you are the best out there at all times.
author: Keyshawn Johnson

quote: I think dress, hairstyle and make-up are the crucial factors in projecting an attractive persona and give one the chance to enhance one's best physical features.
author: Vivienne Westwood

quote: About astrology and palmistry: they are good because they make people vivid and full of possibilities. They are communism at its best. Everybody has a birthday and almost everybody has a palm.
author: Kurt Vonnegut

quote: I grew up with just my mom. She and I were like best friends. She's a very independent woman and I admire that about her. In my life, I've tried to be like that. To be okay with being on my own and being independent.
author: Emma Roberts

quote: Everybody is different. Everybody has different styles. Just do it the best way you know how.
author: Vince Carter

quote: Ethical decisions ensure that everyone's best interests are protected. When in doubt, don't.
author: Harvey Mackay

quote: You only think of the best comeback when you leave.
author: Jimmy Fallon

quote: Never say never. The things that you don't plan are the best. I'm a very spontaneous person.
author: Lindsay Lohan

quote: I don't think any country is perfect. It's our responsibility to do the best we can do to change the things we don't like. I think that's part of social responsibility, and everybody is going to do that in their own way.
author: Tom Brady

quote: The trite saying that honesty is the best policy has met with the just criticism that honesty is not policy. The real honest man is honest from conviction of what is right, not from policy.
author: Robert E. Lee

quote: When you look good, you feel good. Confidence with what you're wearing is very important. If you feel good, you will always perform your best without worrying about anything.
author: Maria Sharapova

quote: My husband and I are best of friends first and foremost. We fight like cats and dogs, but never stay mad for long. I was lucky to find him, he is in every way, my soulmate.
author: Carnie Wilson

quote: I think the best riffs and the best songs come when you're jamming and having a good time.
author: Scott Ian

quote: If a man does his best, what else is there?
author: George S. Patton

quote: Great tragedy has come to us, and we are meeting it with the best that is in our country, with courage and concern for others because this is America. This is who we are.
author: George W. Bush

quote: The best way to remember your wife's birthday is to forget it once.
author: E. Joseph Cossman

quote: Leadership consists of picking good men and helping them do their best.
author: Chester W. Nimitz

quote: To all the positions, I just bring the determination to win. Me being an unselfish player, I think that can carry on to my teammates. When you have one of the best players on the court being unselfish, I think that transfers to the other players.
author: LeBron James

quote: I mean, it's the life lessons that I suppose you learn that nobody gets a free ride and that you do the best you can with the means that you can and try to open yourself to as much knowledge and all that that you can.
author: Joe Mantegna

quote: Let me recommend the best medicine in the world: a long journey, at a mild season, through a pleasant country, in easy stages.
author: James Madison

quote: If you really want to be world class - to be the best you can be - it comes down to preparation and practice.
author: Robin S. Sharma

quote: When you die, others who think they know you, will concoct things about you... Better pick up a pen and write it yourself, for you know yourself best.
author: Sholom Aleichem

quote: That's your best friend and your worst enemy - your own brain.
author: Fred Durst

quote: Since I was younger I've been making the best out of nothing.
author: Wiz Khalifa

quote: Your best T-shirt should be like your bed it just feels like you are home when you are in it.
author: Ashton Kutcher

quote: I guess I'm just an open-hearted, fair, good person. I try to encourage people to be their best and look inside themselves and find out what they are passionate about and expand on that and enjoy life.
author: Miranda Kerr

quote: If you believe that your best years are behind you, you've guaranteed they are; I'm going to dance into that good night, with the oldies turned up loud.
author: Gina Barreca

quote: The best way to resolve any problem in the human world is for all sides to sit down and talk.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: At its best, life is completely unpredictable.
author: Christopher Walken

quote: I would like to be remembered as someone who did the best she could with the talent she had.
author: J. K. Rowling

quote: My life motto is basically to lower your standards and expectations so you're never disappointed and never put any trust in anything, and I try to prepare for the day that I wake up, and everyone I know is like, 'LOL JK best long-running practical joke ever', so I've never really let myself freak out or get too excited about anything.
author: Tavi Gevinson

quote: Maybe black and white is the best medium for landscapes, I don't know.
author: Fay Godwin

quote: Sometimes a little heartbreak is a lesson, and the best thing to do is just learn the lesson.
author: Jon Voight

quote: The best path through life is the highway.
author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quote: A 'naughty pickle' is how I'd best describe myself. I think fun and laughter is the whole point of life.
author: Celia Imrie

quote: I feel that the best companies are started not because the founder wanted a company but because the founder wanted to change the world... If you decide you want to found a company, you maybe start to develop your first idea. And hire lots of workers.
author: Mark Zuckerberg

quote: I marvel at the resilience of the Jewish people. Their best characteristic is their desire to remember. No other people has such an obsession with memory.
author: Elie Wiesel

quote: Cigarettes and coffee: an alcoholic's best friend!
author: Gerard Way

quote: Do not look for approval except for the consciousness of doing your best.
author: Andrew Carnegie

quote: The best way to do ourselves good is to be doing good to others the best way to gather is to scatter.
author: Thomas Brooks

quote: The best thing to do is stare it in the face and move on. We have to face our fears and plow through. I think taking chances takes a lot more courage than staying stagnant and doing what's safe and comfortable.
author: Terri Clark

quote: There is a Japanese proverb that literally goes 'Raise the sail with your stronger hand', meaning you must go after the opportunities that arise in life that you are best equipped to do.
author: Soichiro Honda

quote: You fight, you try your best, but if you lose, you don't have to break five racquets and smash up the locker room. You can do those things, but when you've finished, nothing's changed. You've still lost. If something positive came from that, I probably would do it. But I see only negativity.
author: Rafael Nadal

quote: The best time to plan a book is while you're doing the dishes.
author: Agatha Christie

quote: Whether it's the best of times or the worst of times, it's the only time we've got.
author: Art Buchwald

quote: I don't need to be better than anybody or worse than anybody to feel better about myself. I just need to stick on my own path and stay in the moment as best I can.
author: Marc Jacobs

quote: If we accept being talked to any kind of a way, then we are telling ourselves we are not quite worth the best. And if we have the effrontery to talk to anybody with less than courtesy, we tell ourselves and the world we are not very intelligent.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: The best reason why Monarchy is a strong government is, that it is an intelligible government. The mass of mankind understand it, and they hardly anywhere in the world understand any other.
author: Walter Bagehot

quote: When a man's best friend is his dog, that dog has a problem.
author: Edward Abbey

quote: Society in every state is a blessing, but government, even in its best stage, is but a necessary evil; in its worst state an intolerable one.
author: Thomas Paine

quote: You get the best effort from others not by lighting a fire beneath them, but by building a fire within.
author: Bob Nelson

quote: We hire people who want to make the best things in the world.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: When you love someone, the best thing you can offer is your presence. How can you love if you are not there?
author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote: I think it doesn't matter if you are the best surfer in the world. I'm going to try to be the best surfer I can be. It's not all about competing and being the best. It's more about having fun and just doing what you love.
author: Bethany Hamilton

quote: Fear is our deepest and strongest emotion, and the one which best lends itself to the creation of nature-defying illusions.
author: H. P. Lovecraft

quote: Trying to make a feature film yourself with no money is the best film school you can do.
author: Quentin Tarantino

quote: We must enforce the laws we have on the books, secure our borders, and deny special benefits to illegal immigrants such as in-state tuition rates. This approach is best for American citizens and is fair to those who have taken the time and effort to go through the legal immigration process.
author: Ron DeSantis

quote: No matter what, I'm trying to have fun and, depending on the mood, fun can be on a roller coaster and playing onstage, or fun can be sitting in a room with three of your best friends talking for two hours.
author: Shawn Mendes

quote: Thinking well to be wise: planning well, wiser: doing well wisest and best of all.
author: Malcolm Forbes

quote: At the end of the day, humans are social animals and we are at our best when we get to do things with others who appreciate and enjoy what we enjoy. It's what keeps us human.
author: Simon Sinek

quote: No parent is perfect we all can look back and think of things we could've done to help our children be better prepared for adulthood. And sometimes it's best to admit it to them and encourage them to learn from our mistakes.
author: Billy Graham

quote: If you're going to be a winner in life, you have to constantly go beyond your best.
author: Robert Kiyosaki

quote: We're made for the light of a cave and for twilight. Twilight is the time we see best. When we dim the light down, and the pupil opens, feeling comes out of the eye like touch. Then you really can feel colour, and experience it.
author: James Turrell

quote: The secret is to work less as individuals and more as a team. As a coach, I play not my eleven best, but my best eleven.
author: Knute Rockne

quote: I think the thing about that was I was always willing to work I was not the fastest or biggest player but I was determined to be the best football player I could be on the football field and I think I was able to accomplish that through hard work.
author: Jerry Rice

quote: I don't always have the best eating habits. I like butter and ice cream. There are days when I should work out and I don't. But it's never too late to change old habits.
author: Florence Griffith Joyner

quote: Arrogance, ignorance, and incompetence. Not a pretty cocktail of personality traits in the best of situations. No sirree. Not a pretty cocktail in an office-mate and not a pretty cocktail in a head of state. In fact, in a leader, it's a lethal cocktail.
author: Graydon Carter

quote: You win a race, the next race it's a question mark. Are you still the best or not? That's what is funny. But that's what is interesting. And that's what is challenging. You have to prove yourself every time.
author: Michael Schumacher

quote: Find out what you like doing best and get someone to pay you for it.
author: Katharine Whitehorn

quote: You always want to win. That is why you play tennis, because you love the sport and try to be the best you can at it.
author: Roger Federer

quote: I can't understand it when people are closed-minded. I mean, boy, have I made mistakes and been very wrong. I can't tell you the amounts of times I've been let down, but I still try to see the best in people.
author: Daphne Guinness

quote: The best ideas start as conversations.
author: Jonathan Ive

quote: You can compromise between good, better, and best, and you can compromise between bad and worse and terrible. But you can't compromise between good and evil. And now people look at the other side as a completely different kind of animal and say, 'They are taking the country down the road to purgatory.' It's complete intolerance.
author: Gary Ackerman

quote: In fact, I argue that the future of advertising, whatever the technology, will be to associate each brand with one word. This is one word equity. It's the modern equivalent of having the best site on the high street, except the location is in the mind.
author: Maurice Saatchi

quote: The fox has many tricks. The hedgehog has but one. But that is the best of all.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Expect the best, plan for the worst, and prepare to be surprised.
author: Denis Waitley

quote: I like to stay happy, and I like to live life light and make the best of life.
author: Ciara

quote: If I'm honest I have to tell you I still read fairy-tales and I like them best of all.
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: America has the best doctors, the best nurses, the best hospitals, the best medical technology, the best medical breakthrough medicines in the world. There is absolutely no reason we should not have in this country the best health care in the world.
author: Bill Frist

quote: No hours, nor amount of labor, nor amount of money would deter me from giving the best that there was in me.
author: Colonel Sanders

quote: The best executive is one who has sense enough to pick good people to do what he wants done, and self-restraint enough to keep from meddling with them while they do it.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: I did the best I could, and in some arenas, my best was not good enough. I've made some bad choices.
author: Amy Grant

quote: When I was a boy, the priest, my uncle, carefully inculcated upon me this proverb, which I then learned and have ever since kept in my mind: 'Dico tibi verum, Libertas optima rerum; Nunquam servili, sub nexu vivito, fili.' 'I tell you a truth: Liberty is the best of things, my son; never live under any slavish bond.'
author: William Wallace

quote: Look whether it be indifferently, as well for sins secret as open, what you find to be your best cordials to comfort you, whether God's Word, or natural means.
author: Thomas Hooker

quote: Punishment may make us obey the orders we are given, but at best it will only teach an obedience to authority, not a self-control which enhances our self-respect.
author: Bruno Bettelheim

quote: Give people enough guidance to make the decisions you want them to make. Don't tell them what to do, but encourage them to do what is best.
author: Jimmy Johnson

quote: I always find the mirror in the dressing room is where the best artists are.
author: John Lydon

quote: It's very difficult to think that you're with someone that you know, and all of a sudden you don't know them: it turns out that they betray you. It's painful, but it's best to turn the page.
author: Shakira

quote: A girl's best friend is her pride.
author: Vanity

quote: Sometimes your best investments are the ones you don't make.
author: Donald Trump

quote: It's so amazing to hear a crowd of people singing one of your songs. It's the best feeling.
author: Liam Payne

quote: My best friend is me, and I take good care of me.
author: Diane von Furstenberg

quote: A person always doing his or her best becomes a natural leader, just by example.
author: Joe DiMaggio

quote: There is nothing like a challenge to bring out the best in man.
author: Sean Connery

quote: I'm not the best singer in the world I'm just good at picking up what I want to sound like.
author: Shawn Mendes

quote: In designing the scenery and costumes for any of Shakespeare's plays, the first thing the artist has to settle is the best date for the drama. This should be determined by the general spirit of the play more than by any actual historical references which may occur in it.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: I'm usually cast as the sassy, brassy best friend.
author: Annie Parisse

quote: There is only one real sin and that is to persuade oneself that the second best is anything but second best.
author: Doris Lessing

quote: Just do the best you can. No one can do more than that.
author: John Wooden

quote: I am easily satisfied with the very best.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Why don't you start believing that no matter what you have or haven't done, that your best days are still out in front of you.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: I do know this: God does answer your prayers, but it's not always in the way you expect. God knows what's best for us, though, so there's no need to worry when things don't go how we originally wanted them to go.
author: Lou Holtz

quote: If you can do what you do best and be happy, you're further along in life than most people.
author: Leonardo DiCaprio

quote: You do what you can for as long as you can, and when you finally can't, you do the next best thing. You back up but you don't give up.
author: Chuck Yeager

quote: There's an ease that I have living in Australia. The best things about Sydney are free: the sunshine's free, and the harbour's free, and the beach is free.
author: Russell Crowe

quote: The best way to predict the future is to invent it.
author: Alan Kay

quote: A well regulated militia, composed of the body of the people, trained in arms, is the best most natural defense of a free country.
author: James Madison

quote: In matters of conscience, first thoughts are best. In matters of prudence, last thoughts are best.
author: Robert Hall

quote: The fast, flowing parts, the high-speed corners, that's where a Formula One car is at its best - changes of direction, pulling high g-forces left and right.
author: Jenson Button

quote: I just try to be the best I can, but I'm human.
author: Selena Gomez

quote: Since day one, since the first time I touched the pen, I wanted to be the best at what I do.
author: Kendrick Lamar

quote: The best morale exist when you never hear the word mentioned. When you hear a lot of talk about it, it's usually lousy.
author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quote: The best portraits are those in which there is a slight mixture of caricature.
author: Thomas Babington Macaulay

quote: The advice of the elders to young men is very apt to be as unreal as a list of the hundred best books.
author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Jr.

quote: This is the great reward of service, to live, far out and on, in the life of others; this is the mystery of Christ, - to give life's best for such high sake that it shall be found again unto life eternal.
author: Joshua Chamberlain

quote: The best artist has that thought alone Which is contained within the marble shell The sculptor's hand can only break the spell To free the figures slumbering in the stone.
author: Michelangelo

quote: But one of the things I learned is that when you fight for something you believe in and you tell the truth and you do your best, you can always hold your head up high and no one can take that away from you.
author: Vanessa Kerry

quote: The best situation is being a single parent. The best part about is that you get time off, too, because the kids are with their mom, so it's the best of both worlds. There's a lot to be said for it.
author: Larry David

quote: We're very simple people at Apple. We focus on making the world's best products and enriching people's lives.
author: Tim Cook

quote: Nobody is gonna love you like you. You're gonna be your best salesman.
author: T.I.

quote: The torch relay is an excellent embodiment of all that the Olympic Games have come to symbolise - a celebration of the human spirit. Personally to me, it represents striving to be the best in whatever we do, never giving up despite the odds, and a commitment to health and fitness.
author: Lakshmi Mittal

quote: To be honest, I don't think I'm the best role model in the world. I'm pretty immature sometimes.
author: Louis Tomlinson

quote: Growing up, I was a little hippie kid. I went to some good concerts... Amnesty International with Bob Dylan and Tracy Chapman... The best concert I ever went to was this one at the Cow Palace my freshman year in college on New Year's Eve. It was Pearl Jam opening for Nirvana opening for Red Hot Chili Peppers.
author: Summer Sanders

quote: In the best works of fiction, there's no mustache-twirling villain. I try to write shows where even the bad guy's got his reasons.
author: Lin-Manuel Miranda

quote: The Dalai Lama has taught me that the best way to live life is to try and avoid desire. Desire is really the basic source of unhappiness.
author: Miriam Defensor-Santiago

quote: Disagreement does not necessarily have to be overcome. It may remain an important and constitutive feature of our relations to others and also be seen as something that is merely to be expected in the light of the best explanations we have of how such disagreement arises.
author: Bernard Williams

quote: All our best men are laughed at in this nightmare land.
author: Jack Kerouac

quote: Brevity is the best recommendation of speech, whether in a senator or an orator.
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: My best friend and I love to make fish faces.
author: Beverley Mitchell

quote: I find that the best way to do things is to constantly move forward and to never doubt anything and keep moving forward, if you make a mistake say you made a mistake.
author: John Frusciante

quote: With a fascist the problem is never how best to present the truth to the public but how best to use the news to deceive the public into giving the fascist and his group more money or more power.
author: Henry A. Wallace

quote: Cynical realism is the intelligent man's best excuse for doing nothing in an intolerable situation.
author: Aldous Huxley

quote: I never was a person who wanted a handout. I was a cafeteria worker. I'm not too proud to ask the Best Western manager to give me a job. I have cleaned homes.
author: Shirley Jackson

quote: Now more than ever we need to talk to each other, to listen to each other and understand how we see the world, and cinema is the best medium for doing this.
author: Martin Scorsese

quote: You can do the best research and be making the strongest intellectual argument, but if readers don't get past the third paragraph you've wasted your energy and valuable ink.
author: Carl Hiaasen

quote: I think the best thing for you to do is just live your life. Live a life that's worth living, one where you do what you want to do, pursue your passions. That way, if you meet someone, they'll be joining a life that's already really good.
author: Dan Savage

quote: When grandpa was ill and could've died, I would have swapped all my record sales so he could get well. He is the reason I am a singer. He was my best friend growing up.
author: Michael Buble

quote: I've always believed that there are funny people everywhere, but they're just not comedians. In fact, some of my best comedic inspirations were not professional entertainers.
author: Steve Martin

quote: Fantasy is my favorite genre for reading and writing. We have more options than anyone else, and the best props and special effects. That means if you want to write a fantasy story with Norse gods, sentient robots, and telepathic dinosaurs, you can do just that. Want to throw in a vampire and a lesbian unicorn while you're at it? Go ahead.
author: Patrick Rothfuss

quote: Your boss is only human and just wants the best from you.
author: Naomie Harris

quote: The best thing about the iPhone is this that tells me where I am all the time. There's never a need to feel lost anymore.
author: Gary Shteyngart

quote: The best advice comes from people who don't give advice.
author: Matthew McConaughey

quote: The best way to be productive is to have a great team. So I spend more time than most CEOs on human resources. That's 20 percent of my week.
author: Kevin P. Ryan

quote: My best advice is to not start in PowerPoint. Presentation tools force you to think through information linearly, and you really need to start by thinking of the whole instead of the individual lines.
author: Nancy Duarte

quote: I have no regrets, because I've done everything I could to the best of my ability.
author: Robert Redford

quote: We should live, act, and say nothing to the injury of anyone. It is not only best as a matter of principle, but it is the path to peace and honor.
author: Robert E. Lee

quote: Excellence is the best deterrent to racism or sexism.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Make the best use of what is in your power, and take the rest as it happens.
author: Epictetus

quote: I think all good reporting is the same thing - the best attainable version of the truth.
author: Carl Bernstein

quote: A nice blend of prediction and surprise seem to be at the heart of the best art.
author: Wendy Carlos

quote: The calling of the humanities is to make us truly human in the best sense of the word.
author: J. Irwin Miller

quote: Best of all is it to preserve everything in a pure, still heart, and let there be for every pulse a thanksgiving, and for every breath a song.
author: Konrad von Gesner

quote: What's a bigger mystery box than a movie theater? You go to the theater, you're just so excited to see anything - the moment the lights go down is often the best part.
author: J. J. Abrams

quote: I love what I do, and when you love what you do, you want to be the best at it.
author: Jay-Z

quote: You need to think outside the box. You need to think differently if you want to sustain what, for me, is my peak performance: the very best that I can achieve as an athlete every day.
author: Tom Brady

quote: I do believe that the original sources of all religions should be taught, because with that we will find our similarities, not just our differences. I believe that if Mohammed, Buddha, Jesus, and Moses all got together they would be best of friends because the spiritual basis of all religions is something that builds unity.
author: Yehuda Berg

quote: Let's face it: Most of us don't realize it, but we are failing our kids as reading role models. The best role models are in the home: brothers, fathers, grandfathers; mothers, sisters, grandmothers. Moms and dads, it's important that your kids see you reading. Not just books - reading the newspaper is good, too.
author: James Patterson

quote: I love being a woman. I love the sexiness we get to exude. But the best thing about being a woman is the power we have over men.
author: Eva Longoria

quote: When we do the best that we can, we never know what miracle is wrought in our life, or in the life of another.
author: Helen Keller

quote: The best doctors in the world are Doctor Diet, Doctor Quiet, and Doctor Merryman.
author: Jonathan Swift

quote: You get the best out of others when you get the best out of yourself.
author: Harvey S. Firestone

quote: Do the best that you can in the place where you are, and be kind.
author: Scott Nearing

quote: My spiritual life is... sometimes I have access to it and sometimes I don't. When I do have access to it, it's usually a sense of my understanding what the best course of action or the best thing for me to do. By best, I mean when I have a real sense of doing the right thing and doing good for people and the connected universe of everybody.
author: Al Franken

quote: The best form of government is that which is most likely to prevent the greatest sum of evil.
author: James Monroe

quote: Do your best when no one is looking. If you do that, then you can be successful in anything that you put your mind to.
author: Bob Cousy

quote: I always prefer to believe the best of everybody, it saves so much trouble.
author: Rudyard Kipling

quote: Man, being reasonable, must get drunk; the best of life is but intoxication.
author: Lord Byron

quote: There is one rule for the industrialist and that is: Make the best quality of goods possible at the lowest cost possible, paying the highest wages possible.
author: Henry Ford

quote: The best and safest thing is to keep a balance in your life, acknowledge the great powers around us and in us. If you can do that, and live that way, you are really a wise man.
author: Euripides

quote: Live honestly to a higher note. Life is too short. So, do the best you can and live your life to a higher note.
author: Kimora Lee Simmons

quote: A rich, robust, well-resourced public education is one of the best routes out of poverty and a pathway to prosperity.
author: Randi Weingarten

quote: For a people who are free, and who mean to remain so, a well-organized and armed militia is their best security.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: Mediocre men work at their best men seeking excellence strive to do better.
author: Edwin Louis Cole

quote: The best things in life sometimes happen spontaneously.
author: Jason Statham

quote: Many people think of perfectionism as striving to be your best, but it is not about self-improvement; it's about earning approval and acceptance.
author: Brene Brown

quote: Nowadays, a critic has to watch 700, 800 films a year, and I know through experience, being a juror in prestigious film festivals where supposedly the best films are arriving, from twenty films maybe you see two that are good, one that is so-so, and one that is extraordinary. And the other sixteen are terrible.
author: Alejandro Gonzalez Inarritu

quote: It is best for the wise man not to seem wise.
author: Aeschylus

quote: It was the best of times, it was the worst of times.
author: Charles Dickens

quote: The worst men often give the best advice.
author: Francis Bacon

quote: The best vision is insight.
author: Malcolm Forbes

quote: Just do what you do best.
author: Red Auerbach

quote: The worst thing that happens to you may be the best thing for you if you don't let it get the best of you.
author: Will Rogers

quote: But men are men the best sometimes forget.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Look for your choices, pick the best one, then go with it.
author: Pat Riley

quote: The biggest thing for me is the passion that I've always had for hockey. I remember growing up, no matter what I did in life, my parents always told me to try to do my best at it and be my best. I can say going through different things that that passion is the most important part. It's not skills or talent or any of that stuff.
author: Sidney Crosby

quote: We would all like to vote for the best man but he is never a candidate.
author: Kin Hubbard

quote: I have learned that not diamonds but divorce lawyers are a girl's best friend.
author: Zsa Zsa Gabor

quote: To refrain from imitation is the best revenge.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: The best way to reduce the cost of medical care is to reduce the illness.
author: Arlen Specter

quote: The best advice I've received is to be yourself. The best artists do that.
author: Frank Gehry

quote: The statistics on sanity are that one out of every four Americans is suffering from some form of mental illness. Think of your three best friends. If they're okay, then it's you.
author: Rita Mae Brown

quote: Never argue at the dinner table, for the one who is not hungry always gets the best of the argument.
author: Richard Whately

quote: Laughter is the best medicine - unless you're diabetic, then insulin comes pretty high on the list.
author: Jasper Carrott

quote: I feel the best after a workout - I'm sweaty and exhausted, but it also gives me an energy I really like.
author: Hilary Rhoda

quote: I look at my grandparents and what they dealt with in the Japanese internment in Arizona. That sense of perseverance, of making the best out of an incredibly bad situation, has always been something I drew inspiration from. I always ask myself, 'What in the world do I have to complain about?'
author: Scott Fujita

quote: One way or another, we all have to find what best fosters the flowering of our humanity in this contemporary life, and dedicate ourselves to that.
author: Joseph Campbell

quote: Education must provide the opportunities for self-fulfillment; it can at best provide a rich and challenging environment for the individual to explore, in his own way.
author: Noam Chomsky

quote: In marketing I've seen only one strategy that can't miss - and that is to market to your best customers first, your best prospects second and the rest of the world last.
author: John Romero

quote: Real education should consist of drawing the goodness and the best out of our own students. What better books can there be than the book of humanity?
author: Cesar Chavez

quote: I'm just trying to grow. That's one thing I told myself is, 'Don't worry about who people say is the best player.'
author: Kevin Durant

quote: The best way to impress a woman is to be the most honest you can.
author: Jean Reno

quote: With the Union my best and dearest earthly hopes are entwined.
author: Franklin Pierce

quote: Our best teachers do more than impart facts and figures - they inspire and encourage students and instill a true desire to learn. That's a fine art in itself.
author: Sonny Perdue

quote: There is always some kid who may be seeing me for the first time. I owe him my best.
author: Joe DiMaggio

quote: The night before I compete, I like to have steak. Meat is especially important for female athletes because it provides them with the nutrients they need to perform at their best.
author: Sasha Cohen

quote: Here's what I tell anybody and this is what I believe. The greatest gift we have is the gift of life. We understand that. That comes from our Creator. We're given a body. Now you may not like it, but you can maximize that body the best it can be maximized.
author: Mike Ditka

quote: The point of living and of being an optimist is to be foolish enough to believe the best is yet to come.
author: Peter Ustinov

quote: When I am traveling in a carriage, or walking after a good meal, or during the night when I cannot sleep; it is on such occasions that ideas flow best and most abundantly.
author: Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart

quote: I'd say the best is when I was in Africa, I saw a hippo in a house. Someone had a pet hippo. And they're meant to be one of the most dangerous animals on the planet, and they had one that was sort of just wandering in and out of their house, just sort of roaming about.
author: Karl Pilkington

quote: Horror movies are the best date movies. There's no wondering, 'When do I put my arm around her?'
author: Eli Roth

quote: Above all, don't fear difficult moments. The best comes from them.
author: Rita Levi-Montalcini

quote: It's not easy. I got lots of rejections when I first started out. If you want to write, you have to believe in yourself and not give up. You have to do your best to practice and get better.
author: Rick Riordan

quote: In the animal kingdom, one of the keys to survival is to outwit your enemies. And when you're surrounded by carnivores, one of the best strategies is to fade into the background and disappear.
author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quote: I think laughter is the best medicine. If you can't laugh at yourself, then you can't laugh at life and the silliness of it all.
author: David Hasselhoff

quote: Entrepreneurship is like a computer game in which you have to master every level before achieving success. Startups repeatedly stumble and have to go back to the drawing board. The best way to skip some levels and to increase the odds of survival is to learn from others who have already played the game.
author: Vivek Wadhwa

quote: At United, there are great traditions, which you can't buy in one or two years. They are created by victories. You need to prove again and again that you are better than the others. Manchester United have always done this, and are still doing it, so they are the best.
author: Cristiano Ronaldo

quote: The best art is realized when you can share the experience of making of it and not just the presentation of it, so that the audience is part of the creation and not just part of the consumption. Then it becomes much more full-bodied and robust.
author: Ava DuVernay

quote: I focus on making sure I'm sharp, and it doesn't matter who I am fighting. I need to perform at my best and try to elevate my game to the highest level I possibly can, so that is what I concentrate on doing.
author: Robbie Lawler

quote: I'm at my best when people are depending on me. If it's just on me and I don't have nothing to do, I'm going to be lazy. On the football field, it's every single day, every play, knowing that people are depending on me to make my play. That helps me elevate my game to another level.
author: Von Miller

quote: Do the best you can in every task, no matter how unimportant it may seem at the time. No one learns more about a problem than the person at the bottom.
author: Sandra Day O'Connor

quote: He who laughs most, learns best.
author: John Cleese

quote: A good book is the best of friends, the same today and forever.
author: Martin Farquhar Tupper

quote: As simple as it sounds, we all must try to be the best person we can: by making the best choices, by making the most of the talents we've been given.
author: Mary Lou Retton

quote: Only mediocrity can be trusted to be always at its best.
author: Max Beerbohm

quote: All the best people in life seem to like LINUX.
author: Steve Wozniak

quote: Knowing that we can be loved exactly as we are gives us all the best opportunity for growing into the healthiest of people.
author: Fred Rogers

quote: I am afraid we must make the world honest before we can honestly say to our children that honesty is the best policy.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: My parents sacrificed so much for all of us. It makes me want to give back to them by being the best I can be.
author: Diana Lopez

quote: Michael Jordon may have been the best basketball player in history, but he couldn't have won six NBA titles without a team.
author: Mark E. Hyman

quote: Sometimes you feel awkward being what you're best at, you feel like you have to be something new.
author: Marilyn Manson

quote: The best evaluation I can make of a player is to look in his eyes and see how scared they are.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: I think my best work is when I'm kind of in charge.
author: Chris Rock

quote: I regarded finding I had a form of Alzheimer's as an insult and decided to do my best to marshal any kind of forces I could against this wretched disease. I have posterior cortical atrophy or PCA. They say, rather ingenuously, that if you have Alzheimer's it's the best form of Alzheimer's to have.
author: Terry Pratchett

quote: That's what liberalism is all about, is promoting incompetence on the basis it's fair, because people would be the best if they weren't discriminated against.
author: Rush Limbaugh

quote: Write your story as it needs to be written. Write it honestly, and tell it as best you can. I'm not sure that there are any other rules. Not ones that matter.
author: Neil Gaiman

quote: Ideas percolate. Through natural selection, the best ones survive.
author: Andrew Lo

quote: I was a super-duper Tupac fan, and I realized later, when I became a huge Nas fan and a huge Eminem fan, I was drawn to the storytellers. They all told stories in different ways, but they were all like the best storytellers.
author: J. Cole

quote: Innovation and best practices can be sown throughout an organization - but only when they fall on fertile ground.
author: Marcus Buckingham

quote: The best clubs in the world are always the clubs where you have a variety of people. Like, you have the crazy people, you have the nicely dressed people, you have the office people, you have the regular guys - that makes it fun.
author: Tiesto

quote: Never die easy. Why run out of bounds and die easy? Make that linebacker pay. It carries into all facets of your life. It's okay to lose, to die, but don't die without trying, without giving it your best.
author: Walter Payton

quote: My mind has been both my best friend and my worst enemy.
author: Elyn Saks

quote: Friends always ask me what the best Indian restaurant in L.A. is. I'm like, 'I don't know, dude. I have an app on my iPhone for that.'
author: Noureen DeWulf

quote: My motto is to do everything absolutely flat out and to the best of your ability.
author: Allan McNish

quote: Cognitive psychology has shown that the mind best understands facts when they are woven into a conceptual fabric, such as a narrative, mental map, or intuitive theory. Disconnected facts in the mind are like unlinked pages on the Web: They might as well not exist.
author: Steven Pinker

quote: I was first in line for the iPhone, but I'm not a fanboy of any company - I'm in favor of anything that's best of breed.
author: Robert Scoble

quote: Goodness is beauty in the best estate.
author: Christopher Marlowe

quote: The best way out of a difficulty is through it.
author: Will Rogers

quote: I have made the choices that work best for me. I know I cannot please everyone, and that's fine.
author: Marlee Matlin

quote: Nobody who ever gave his best regretted it.
author: George Halas

quote: People who lean on logic and philosophy and rational exposition end by starving the best part of the mind.
author: William Butler Yeats

quote: I believe that a simple and unassuming manner of life is best for everyone, best both for the body and the mind.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Expect the best. Prepare for the worst. Capitalize on what comes.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: When the world is running down, you make the best of what's still around.
author: Sting

quote: Just live life. That's the best way to learn how to act. Just live.
author: Rory Culkin

quote: Best thing that's happened this year? Maybe Hostel. It was a great experience. I loved it.
author: Jay Hernandez

quote: The President of the United States should strive to be always mindful of the fact that he serves his party best who serves his country best.
author: Rutherford B. Hayes

quote: Watching a good actor is the best way to learn.
author: Kieran Culkin

quote: I never understand when people say, 'School days are the best of your life.' So it's all downhill from 16? How depressing.
author: Marsha Thomason

quote: There's a tipping point that happens with soccer in which you just kinda get it. I was drawn to it because the best soccer teams play similarly to my favorite basketball teams - like the eighties Lakers or eighties Celtics - teams that emphasized teamwork over individualism and relied on passing as their biggest ongoing edge.
author: Bill Simmons

quote: Nobody's life is a bed of roses. We all have crosses to bear, and we all just do our best. I would never claim to have the worst situation. There are many widows, and many people dying of AIDS, many people killed in Lebanon, people starving all over the planet. So we have to count our lucky stars.
author: Yoko Ono

quote: By taking to the road, we free ourselves of baggage, both physical and psychological. We walk back to our original condition, to our best selves.
author: Robyn Davidson

quote: The best way to forget ones self is to look at the world with attention and love.
author: Red Auerbach

quote: Your purpose is to make your audience see what you saw, hear what you heard, feel what you felt. Relevant detail, couched in concrete, colorful language, is the best way to recreate the incident as it happened and to picture it for the audience.
author: Dale Carnegie

quote: So if diva means giving your best, then yes, I guess I am a diva.
author: Patti LaBelle

quote: There would be no debate about who was the best footballer the world had ever seen - me or Pele. Everyone would say me.
author: Diego Maradona

quote: Participation, I think, or one of the best methods of educating.
author: Tom Glazer

quote: I'm not the best singer, but I like the way I sing my songs.
author: Benmont Tench

quote: Soap and water and common sense are the best disinfectants.
author: William Osler

quote: I try my best, but at the same time, I try not to let being out with someone affect my everyday life. Like, if I want to go out and grab a smoothie with a friend who's a male, I'm not gonna let the paparazzi stop me from doing that and living my life and just being a normal person.
author: Kendall Jenner

quote: If I am a cup maker, I'm interested in making the best cup I possibly can. My effort goes into that cup, not what people think about it.
author: Denzel Washington

quote: That is the difference between good teachers and great teachers: good teachers make the best of a pupil's means great teachers foresee a pupil's ends.
author: Maria Callas

quote: The corruption of the best things gives rise to the worst.
author: David Hume

quote: I've always been a pretty candid person. I'm not a very secretive person I'm not a very discreet person. One of my best friends once described me as pathologically indiscreet.
author: Andrew Sullivan

quote: Life is about not knowing, having to change, taking the moment and making the best of it, without knowing what's going to happen next.
author: Gilda Radner

quote: I started getting Twitter followers after I started doing press for 'Fargo.' One of my best friends from college is a librarian, and she started tracking after each interview how many Twitter followers I got. She and her librarian friends were like, 'We're going to make a graph.' And I was like, 'Alright, nerds.'
author: Allison Tolman

quote: We have to face the fact that countries are going to lose jobs to robotics. The only question that needs to be answered is which country will create and own the best robotic technology and have the infrastructure necessary to enable it.
author: Mark Cuban

quote: If I stopped writing and being at my piano, I wouldn't know how to live. It's your best friend.
author: Jessi Colter

quote: To be a utilitarian means that you judge actions as right or wrong in accordance with whether they have good consequences. So you try to do what will have the best consequences for all of those affected.
author: Peter Singer

quote: My job is to play quarterback, and I'm going to do that the best way I know how, because I owe that to my teammates regardless of who is out there on the field with me.
author: Tom Brady

quote: You had better live your best and act your best and think your best today for today is the sure preparation for tomorrow and all the other tomorrows that follow.
author: Harriet Martineau

quote: It pays to get drunk with the best people.
author: Joe E. Lewis

quote: Set up another case bartender! The best thing for a case of nerves is a case of Scotch.
author: W. C. Fields

quote: My best vacation memory is getting barreled at the beach in Hawaii.
author: Troy Polamalu

quote: For every athlete, it is very important to be able to engage in their favorite thing, give all the best in training, performing in competitions, defending the honor of the motherland.
author: Fedor Emelianenko

quote: Even between the best of friends, mistakes and misunderstandings can happen.
author: Avigdor Lieberman

quote: I think it's very hard to find a good friend. That's why I'm so lucky to have two sisters, because they're my best friends, and they have to be with me forever. They're stuck with me.
author: Kate Upton

quote: Likewise, there is no evidence that texting teaches people to spell badly: rather, research shows that those kids who text frequently are more likely to be the most literate and the best spellers, because you have to know how to manipulate language.
author: David Crystal

quote: I have won many awards and I am very happy about this, but I am not the best player in the world.
author: Zinedine Zidane

quote: A high-powered, successful woman doesn't necessarily have the same support behind her that a man in that position would. Plus, she's expected to be a domestic goddess, as well as the best wife, mother, friend, and lover. But it's not just in politics: you see it in acting, too, and in journalism.
author: Raquel Cassidy

quote: Since scarcity is the basic economic problem, if it does not exist then there is no reason for my economics course. Devoting time to the study of how people use limited resources to fulfill unlimited wants and needs should help us to discover how to best utilize the resources we have at our disposal.
author: Kurt Bills

quote: Sometimes the best way to learn something is by doing it wrong and looking at what you did.
author: Neil Gaiman

quote: We can use decision-making to choose the habits we want to form, use willpower to get the habit started, then - and this is the best part - we can allow the extraordinary power of habit to take over. At that point, we're free from the need to decide and the need to use willpower.
author: Gretchen Rubin

quote: One of the best predictors of policy around is Thomas Ferguson's investment theory of politics, as he calls it - very outstanding political economist - which essentially - I mean, to say it in a sentence, he describes elections as occasions in which groups of investors coalesce and invest to control the state.
author: Noam Chomsky

quote: I have never - I have never let go of my childhood contacts. My best friends from childhood are still my best friends.
author: Oscar Hijuelos

quote: My best birth control now is just to leave the lights on.
author: Joan Rivers

quote: Infinite striving to be the best is man's duty it is its own reward. Everything else is in God's hands.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: If someone were to put a proposition before men bidding them choose, after examination, the best customs in the world, each nation would certainly select its own.
author: Herodotus

quote: That was the best ice cream soda I ever tasted.
author: Lou Costello

quote: Every single job is a challenge. You are walking into a new set, a new character, creating a world and trying to get comfortable to do your best work.
author: Felicia Day

quote: When we believe the best of people, we let go of each thing they do that is hurtful to us. And we choose to think things like, 'I don't believe they meant to hurt me.' 'Maybe they're having a bad day or don't feel well.' 'They probably don't even realize how they sound.'
author: Joyce Meyer

quote: I consider my ability to arouse enthusiasm among men the greatest asset I possess. The way to develop the best that is in a man is by appreciation and encouragement.
author: Charles M. Schwab

quote: In life, try your best to do the right thing. Have fun while you're alive. Take advantage of every asset you have. Don't take anything for granted.
author: Justin Chon

quote: When you're onstage and the audience is smiling and singing and bopping along and you're all on the same level, it's the best feeling in the world. It may sound dumb and corny to say it, but it's like pure love.
author: Joan Jett

quote: Learn to invest in the best quality you can afford and wear pieces in different ways.
author: Michael Kors

quote: The best description of the Old Testament that I heard was that it starts out as mythology, then it becomes legend, then it becomes history. In the mythological period - there is a distinct mythological period in the Old Testament, where the time spans are impossible and really just imagined.
author: Harold Ramis

quote: My philosophy is that not only are you responsible for your life, but doing the best at this moment puts you I the best place for the next moment.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: The best move you can make in negotiation is to think of an incentive the other person hasn't even thought of - and then meet it.
author: Eli Broad

quote: I have never gone on a real trip, never taken a holiday. The best holiday for me is spent in my workshops when nearly everybody else is on vacation.
author: Enzo Ferrari

quote: I've learned that I am allowed to say what I like and what I don't like. And I've learned that I have to be professional and not be everyone's best friend.
author: Bobbi Brown

quote: I'm not afraid of working hard at anything, whatever it is. I just always want to be the best that I can.
author: Gisele Bundchen

quote: I'm just doing the best I can now to keep this going... trying to grow up and remain young at the same time.
author: Stevie Ray Vaughan

quote: In football, it's the job of the player to play, the coach to coach, the official to officiate. Each guy is charged with upholding his end, nothing more. In golf, the player, coach and official are rolled into one, and they overlap completely. Golf really is the best microcosm of life - or at least the way life should be.
author: Lou Holtz

quote: Working with some of the best makeup artists has taught me a lot of amazing tricks to making me feel more confident, and I can't wait to share them with you guys.
author: Kylie Jenner

quote: I don't plan to take a formal, cold approach with my children, but I expect a lot. I don't want my children to view me as their best friend. I want to be their mom.
author: Ivanka Trump

quote: The best substitute for experience is being sixteen.
author: Raymond Duncan

quote: Perhaps it sounds ridiculous, but the best thing that young filmmakers should do is to get hold of a camera and some film and make a movie of any kind at all.
author: Stanley Kubrick

quote: I've found the best way is to not be scared of the attention but to be grateful for it and open to it. It makes my days better rather than being annoyed that people want my attention.
author: Brandon Routh

quote: Fit no stereotypes. Don't chase the latest management fads. The situation dictates which approach best accomplishes the team's mission.
author: Colin Powell

quote: I think one of the reasons that we like conspiracy theories is I think that we like to feel like there is a group of people who are so smart and powerful that they can pull the wool over an entire country or in fact even an entire world's eyes. That certainly makes us feel like somehow we're protected, even if it's not in our best interest.
author: Jason Ritter

quote: You know I need that cockiness, the self-belief, arrogance, swagger, whatever you want to call it, I need that on the golf course to bring the best out of myself. So you know once I leave the golf course, you know that all gets left there.
author: Rory McIlroy

quote: I haven't personally experienced bullying, but when I was in high school, I had a best friend who became a bully. I took a stand and took it upon myself to separate from her. I couldn't be associated with her because it wasn't the type of person I wanted to be.
author: Amber Riley

quote: The bold adventurer succeeds the best.
author: Ovid

quote: The best solutions are often simple, yet unexpected.
author: Julian Casablancas

quote: The best of life is to embark on an adventure with a woman interested in having an adventure with you.
author: Oleg Cassini

quote: Hockey lends itself to special events, including the Olympic competition: a glorious tournament of the best players in the world, putting on their national jerseys and playing on big rinks with no-goon Olympic rules and referee enforcement.
author: George Vecsey

quote: Experience taught me a few things. One is to listen to your gut, no matter how good something sounds on paper. The second is that you're generally better off sticking with what you know. And the third is that sometimes your best investments are the ones you don't make.
author: Donald Trump

quote: We're all flawed, but basically, effective managers are people whose flaws are not fatal under the circumstances. Maybe the best managers are simply ordinary, healthy people who aren't too screwed up.
author: Henry Mintzberg

quote: I will do my best. That is all I can do. I ask for your help - and God's.
author: Lyndon B. Johnson

quote: Just the fact that a thousand people in front of me were ready to hear me sing was one of the best feelings I can think of.
author: Shawn Mendes

quote: The prizes go to those who meet emergencies successfully. And the way to meet emergencies is to do each daily task the best we can.
author: William Feather

quote: I was blessed with certain gifts and talents and God gave them to me to be the best person I can be and to have a positive impact on other people.
author: Bryan Clay

quote: My mother and I are more than best friends; we are partners in crime. After she and my father, Quincy Jones, separated when I was 10 years old, my sister, Kidada, who was 12, went to live with our dad, and I stayed with my mother.
author: Rashida Jones

quote: When I do interviews, I enter them with an open mind and try to answer the questions the best I can.
author: Tom Araya

quote: The best thing I have is the knife from Fatal Attraction. I hung it in my kitchen. It's my way of saying, Don't mess with me.
author: Glenn Close

quote: The best effort of a fine person is felt after we have left their presence.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: In politics, strangely enough, the best way to play your cards is to lay them face upwards on the table.
author: H. G. Wells

quote: The best things and best people rise out of their separateness I'm against a homogenized society because I want the cream to rise.
author: Robert Frost

quote: Let America first praise mediocrity even, in her children, before she praises... the best excellence in the children of any other land.
author: Herman Melville

quote: Prosperity is the best protector of principle.
author: Mark Twain

quote: I think the best thing I can do is to be a distraction. A husband lives and breathes his work all day long. If he comes home to more table thumping, how can the poor man ever relax?
author: Jackie Kennedy

quote: Personally, I think the best motto for an educational establishment is: 'Or Would You Rather Be a Mule?'
author: Terry Pratchett

quote: Conscious of my own weakness, I can only seek fervently the guidance of the Ruler of the Universe, and, relying on His all-powerful aid, do my best to restore Union and peace to a suffering people, and to establish and guard their liberties and rights.
author: George B. McClellan

quote: To this day, I still think Lonesome Dove is my best part.
author: Robert Duvall

quote: Each of us has been put on earth with the ability to do something well. We cheat ourselves and the world if we don't use that ability as best we can.
author: George Allen, Sr.

quote: We can choose a future where we export more products and outsource fewer jobs. After a decade that was defined by what we bought and borrowed, we're getting back to basics, and doing what America has always done best: We're making things again.
author: Barack Obama

quote: Blueberries, strawberries and blackberries are true super foods. Naturally sweet and juicy, berries are low in sugar and high in nutrients - they are among the best foods you can eat.
author: Joel Fuhrman

quote: Some people have been kind enough to call me a fine artist. I've always called myself an illustrator. I'm not sure what the difference is. All I know is that whatever type of work I do, I try to give it my very best. Art has been my life.
author: Norman Rockwell

quote: The best thing about the future is that it comes only one day at a time.
author: Dean Acheson

quote: Culture is the habit of being pleased with the best and knowing why.
author: Henry Van Dyke

quote: But I always think that the best way to know God is to love many things.
author: Vincent Van Gogh

quote: The most basic question is not what is best, but who shall decide what is best.
author: Thomas Sowell

quote: He who has done his best for his own time has lived for all times.
author: Friedrich Schiller

quote: I did my best, and God did the rest.
author: Hattie McDaniel

quote: The World Trade Center site will forever hold a special place in our city, in our hearts. But we would be untrue to the best part of ourselves and who we are as New Yorkers and Americans if we said no to a mosque in lower Manhattan.
author: Michael Bloomberg

quote: The best career advice to give to the young is, 'Find out what you like doing best and get someone to pay you for doing it.'
author: Katharine Whitehorn

quote: Maria is the best reason to come home.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: The abduction of a child is a tragedy. No one can fully understand or appreciate what a parent goes through at such a time, unless they have faced a similar tragedy. Every parent responds differently. Each parent copes with this nightmare in the best way he or she knows how.
author: John Walsh

quote: Townes Van Zandt is the best songwriter in the whole world, and I'll stand on Bob Dylan's coffee table in my cowboy boots and say that.
author: Steve Earle

quote: The best prophet of the future is the past.
author: Lord Byron

quote: I just need to know that I did the very best I could and that I was true to myself.
author: Lenny Kravitz

quote: Competition brings out the best in products and the worst in people.
author: David Sarnoff

quote: It is best to act with confidence, no matter how little right you have to it.
author: Lillian Hellman

quote: One cannot develop taste from what is of average quality but only from the very best.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: I believe in Las Vegas. I think its best days are ahead of it. But I'm afraid to do anything in the current political environment in the United States.
author: Steve Wynn

quote: If I have a rap album I'm dropping, then I want it to be the best rap album.
author: Lil Wayne

quote: Wishful thinking is not idealism. It is self-indulgence at best and self-exaltation at worst. In either case, it is usually at the expense of others. In other words, it is the opposite of idealism.
author: Thomas Sowell

quote: Accept who you are and try and make the best of that.
author: Randy Jackson

quote: I want to deal with what's in front of me now to the best of my abilities, and sometimes that's not very good. But a lot of the days it is really great.
author: Ringo Starr

quote: Really in technology, it's about the people, getting the best people, retaining them, nurturing a creative environment and helping to find a way to innovate.
author: Marissa Mayer

quote: I've run the Boston Marathon 6 times before. I think the best aspects of the marathon are the beautiful changes of the scenery along the route and the warmth of the people's support. I feel happier every time I enter this marathon.
author: Haruki Murakami

quote: I realise that I had the best of serious picture journalism. There was an innocence in our approach, especially in the 1950s and 1960s when we naively believed that by holding a mirror up to the world we could help - no matter how little - to make people aware of the human condition.
author: Eve Arnold

quote: After decades spent in rewrite rooms surrounded by other shouting writers, I discovered that I work best alone. I like being in charge of my time, working out the problems according to my own rhythms and being able to nap. That's a big one, the napping on demand!
author: Maria Semple

quote: I still feel like my best surfing is ahead of me.
author: Kelly Slater

quote: I always want to be the best at what I do. That doesn't mean compared to other people, but just in what you do.
author: Derek Hough

quote: In order to figure this artmaking stuff out, it's trial and error and experimentation, and takes some time and hard thinking. Putting work out in many forms and stages is an extension of how I see things. I feel the art process is best served when it invites comments and constructive criticism from people.
author: Jim Goldberg

quote: Look your best - who said love is blind?
author: Mae West

quote: Our best thoughts come from others.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: To give and then not feel that one has given is the very best of all ways of giving.
author: Max Beerbohm

quote: Enthusiasm is the best protection in any situation. Wholeheartedness is contagious. Give yourself, if you wish to get others.
author: David Seabury

quote: The days you work are the best days.
author: Georgia O'Keeffe

quote: When you do not know what you are doing and what you are doing is the best - that is inspiration.
author: Robert Bresson

quote: The things we know best are the things we haven't been taught.
author: Luc de Clapiers

quote: If you want to go somewhere, it is best to find someone who has already been there.
author: Robert Kiyosaki

quote: The human species, according to the best theory I can form of it, is composed of two distinct races, the men who borrow and the men who lend.
author: Charles Lamb

quote: Satire works best when it hews close to the line between the outlandish and the possible - and as that line continues to grow thinner, the satirist's task becomes ever more difficult.
author: Graydon Carter

quote: The short words are best, and the old words are the best of all.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: The best is the enemy of the good.
author: Voltaire

quote: The best thing to do with the best things in life is to give them up.
author: Ambrose Bierce

quote: Clever men are good, but they are not the best.
author: Thomas Carlyle

quote: Best to live lightly, unthinkingly.
author: Sophocles

quote: Since we live in this world, we have to do our best for this world.
author: Aung San Suu Kyi

quote: Usually, the stuff that's your best idea or work is going to be attacked the most.
author: Francis Ford Coppola

quote: The best things in life are silly.
author: Scott Adams

quote: Next to acquiring good friends, the best acquisition is that of good books.
author: Charles Caleb Colton

quote: Everybody's got a job to do, and I do mine as best I can.
author: Marlee Matlin

quote: I am the best in baseball.
author: Reggie Jackson

quote: The man who has done his best has done everything.
author: Charles M. Schwab

quote: You'll live. Only the best get killed.
author: Charles de Gaulle

quote: Call me All-American, but I love Ham and Cheese sandwiches. And not just any old ham and cheese sandwich... My mother's is the best. I've tried many times to make these sandwiches on my own, but it's never the same.
author: Andy Roddick

quote: The best thing about animals is that they don't talk much.
author: Thornton Wilder

quote: The best way to keep your friends is not to give them away.
author: Wilson Mizner

quote: The best person to get something done is a busy person.
author: Mark Burnett

quote: Life is best when you are in love.
author: Michael Moriarty

quote: The creed of a true saint is to make the best of life, and to make the most of it.
author: Edwin Hubbel Chapin

quote: One of the best things to do sometimes is simply to be.
author: Eric Butterworth

quote: Most of the things we decide are not what we know to be the best. We say yes, merely because we are driven into a corner and must say something.
author: Frank Crane

quote: No man has a good enough memory to be a successful liar.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: The less we deserve good fortune, the more we hope for it.
author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: The good times of today, are the sad thoughts of tomorrow.
author: Bob Marley

quote: Goodness is about character - integrity, honesty, kindness, generosity, moral courage, and the like. More than anything else, it is about how we treat other people.
author: Dennis Prager

quote: We shall never know all the good that a simple smile can do.
author: Mother Teresa
