quote: Friends and good manners will carry you where money won't go.
author: Margaret Walker

quote: A father is a man who expects his son to be as good a man as he meant to be.
author: Frank A. Clark

quote: Be true to yourself, help others, make each day your masterpiece, make friendship a fine art, drink deeply from good books - especially the Bible, build a shelter against a rainy day, give thanks for your blessings and pray for guidance every day.
author: John Wooden

quote: When you think positive, good things happen.
author: Matt Kemp

quote: To enjoy the glow of good health, you must exercise.
author: Gene Tunney

quote: A good traveler has no fixed plans, and is not intent on arriving.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: I have been very blessed in my life and rewarded with good friends and good health. I am grateful and happy to be able to share this.
author: Eric Idle

quote: No matter how good you think you are as a leader, my goodness, the people around you will have all kinds of ideas for how you can get better. So for me, the most fundamental thing about leadership is to have the humility to continue to get feedback and to try to get better - because your job is to try to help everybody else get better.
author: Jim Yong Kim

quote: Good health and good sense are two of life's greatest blessings.
author: Publilius Syrus

quote: There is nothing either good or bad but thinking makes it so.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: A good head and a good heart are always a formidable combination.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: A simple life is good with me. I don't need a whole lot. For me, a T-shirt, a pair of shorts, barefoot on a beach and I'm happy.
author: Yanni

quote: To keep the body in good health is a duty... otherwise we shall not be able to keep our mind strong and clear.
author: Buddha

quote: For good ideas and true innovation, you need human interaction, conflict, argument, debate.
author: Margaret Heffernan

quote: There are two kinds of pride, both good and bad. 'Good pride' represents our dignity and self-respect. 'Bad pride' is the deadly sin of superiority that reeks of conceit and arrogance.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: Technology is nothing. What's important is that you have a faith in people, that they're basically good and smart, and if you give them tools, they'll do wonderful things with them.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: A good husband makes a good wife.
author: John Florio

quote: The most important thing is to have a good relationship with the bike... you have to understand what she wants. I think of a motorcycle as a woman, and I know that sounds silly, but it's true.
author: Valentino Rossi

quote: Good night, good night! Parting is such sweet sorrow, that I shall say good night till it be morrow.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Observe good faith and justice toward all nations. Cultivate peace and harmony with all.
author: George Washington

quote: The secret to success is good leadership, and good leadership is all about making the lives of your team members or workers better.
author: Tony Dungy

quote: There is no more lovely, friendly and charming relationship, communion or company than a good marriage.
author: Martin Luther

quote: Nobody gets justice. People only get good luck or bad luck.
author: Orson Welles

quote: Inside each of us, there is the seed of both good and evil. It's a constant struggle as to which one will win. And one cannot exist without the other.
author: Eric Burdon

quote: It is easy to hate and it is difficult to love. This is how the whole scheme of things works. All good things are difficult to achieve and bad things are very easy to get.
author: Confucius

quote: A good person can make another person good it means that goodness will elicit goodness in the society other persons will also be good.
author: Bhumibol Adulyadej

quote: They're only truly great who are truly good.
author: George Chapman

quote: The ultimate tragedy is not the oppression and cruelty by the bad people but the silence over that by the good people.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: Surround yourself with really good people. I think that's an important thing. Because the people you surround yourself are a reflection of you.
author: Aaron Rodgers

quote: Every day is a good day to be alive, whether the sun's shining or not.
author: Marty Robbins

quote: After every storm the sun will smile; for every problem there is a solution, and the soul's indefeasible duty is to be of good cheer.
author: William R. Alger

quote: How far that little candle throws its beams! So shines a good deed in a naughty world.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: At the end of the day, if I can say I had fun, it was a good day.
author: Simone Biles

quote: Humans aren't as good as we should be in our capacity to empathize with feelings and thoughts of others, be they humans or other animals on Earth. So maybe part of our formal education should be training in empathy. Imagine how different the world would be if, in fact, that were 'reading, writing, arithmetic, empathy.'
author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quote: It takes many good deeds to build a good reputation, and only one bad one to lose it.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: True friendship multiplies the good in life and divides its evils. Strive to have friends, for life without friends is like life on a desert island... to find one real friend in a lifetime is good fortune; to keep him is a blessing.
author: Baltasar Gracian

quote: Good friends, good books and a sleepy conscience: this is the ideal life.
author: Mark Twain

quote: The good physician treats the disease the great physician treats the patient who has the disease.
author: William Osler

quote: I travel light. I think the most important thing is to be in a good mood and enjoy life, wherever you are.
author: Diane von Furstenberg

quote: What I've realized over the years is that I have some pretty good friends.
author: Anthony Kiedis

quote: A good marriage would be between a blind wife and a deaf husband.
author: Michel de Montaigne

quote: A good laugh is sunshine in the house.
author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quote: Finance is not merely about making money. It's about achieving our deep goals and protecting the fruits of our labor. It's about stewardship and, therefore, about achieving the good society.
author: Robert J. Shiller

quote: Get outside. Watch the sunrise. Watch the sunset. How does that make you feel? Does it make you feel big or tiny? Because there's something good about feeling both.
author: Amy Grant

quote: A good plan violently executed now is better than a perfect plan executed next week.
author: George S. Patton

quote: Just as treasures are uncovered from the earth, so virtue appears from good deeds, and wisdom appears from a pure and peaceful mind. To walk safely through the maze of human life, one needs the light of wisdom and the guidance of virtue.
author: Buddha

quote: A good decision is based on knowledge and not on numbers.
author: Plato

quote: You have to remember that the hard days are what make you stronger. The bad days make you realize what a good day is. If you never had any bad days, you would never have that sense of accomplishment!
author: Aly Raisman

quote: One of the key problems today is that politics is such a disgrace, good people don't go into government.
author: Donald Trump

quote: I am trying to be a good person. I am trying to be myself, and if nobody likes me for me, that is their problem.
author: Evan Rachel Wood

quote: It makes my heart sick when I remember all the good words and the broken promises.
author: Chief Joseph

quote: People like to say that the conflict is between good and evil. The real conflict is between truth and lies.
author: Don Miguel Ruiz

quote: Good painting is like good cooking; it can be tasted, but not explained.
author: Maurice de Vlaminck

quote: You don't know how good you are until you actually get out on a bike and get riding.
author: Laura Trott

quote: Corruption is the enemy of development, and of good governance. It must be got rid of. Both the government and the people at large must come together to achieve this national objective.
author: Pratibha Patil

quote: Reading is a conversation. All books talk. But a good book listens as well.
author: Mark Haddon

quote: Good, bad or indifferent, if you are not investing in new technology, you are going to be left behind.
author: Philip Green

quote: We have to be bold in our national ambitions. First, we must win the fight against poverty within the next decade. Second, we must improve moral standards in government and society to provide a strong foundation for good governance. Third, we must change the character of our politics to promote fertile ground for reforms.
author: Gloria Macapagal Arroyo

quote: Sexiness is all about your personality, being genuine and confident, and being a good person.
author: Erin Heatherton

quote: The difference between something good and something great is attention to detail.
author: Charles R. Swindoll

quote: Every good citizen makes his country's honor his own, and cherishes it not only as precious but as sacred. He is willing to risk his life in its defense and is conscious that he gains protection while he gives it.
author: Andrew Jackson

quote: I define friendship as a bond that transcends all barriers. When you are ready to expect anything and everything from friends, good, bad or ugly... that's what I call true friendship.
author: Harbhajan Singh

quote: For every good reason there is to lie, there is a better reason to tell the truth.
author: Bo Bennett

quote: Good luck is when opportunity meets preparation, while bad luck is when lack of preparation meets reality.
author: Eliyahu Goldratt

quote: Sharing is good, and with digital technology, sharing is easy.
author: Richard Stallman

quote: Good company in a journey makes the way seem shorter.
author: Izaak Walton

quote: Education begins the gentleman, but reading, good company and reflection must finish him.
author: John Locke

quote: Drawing is the honesty of the art. There is no possibility of cheating. It is either good or bad.
author: Salvador Dali

quote: Good advertising does not just circulate information. It penetrates the public mind with desires and belief.
author: Leo Burnett

quote: Nothing good ever comes of violence.
author: Martin Luther

quote: A mountain is composed of tiny grains of earth. The ocean is made up of tiny drops of water. Even so, life is but an endless series of little details, actions, speeches, and thoughts. And the consequences whether good or bad of even the least of them are far-reaching.
author: Swami Sivananda

quote: Diligence is the mother of good luck.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: All good is hard. All evil is easy. Dying, losing, cheating, and mediocrity is easy. Stay away from easy.
author: Scott Alexander

quote: The fragrance of flowers spreads only in the direction of the wind. But the goodness of a person spreads in all directions.
author: Chanakya

quote: When I am myself, I am happy and have a good result.
author: Jack Ma

quote: I just want to say, good night, sweet prince, may flights of angels sing thee to thy rest.
author: Harry Dean Stanton

quote: The good life is a process, not a state of being. It is a direction not a destination.
author: Carl Rogers

quote: It's far better to shoot a good picture than a good-looking picture.
author: Robert Richardson

quote: I'm a true believer in karma. You get what you give, whether it's bad or good.
author: Sandra Bullock

quote: Looking good and feeling good go hand in hand. If you have a healthy lifestyle, your diet and nutrition are set, and you're working out, you're going to feel good.
author: Jason Statham

quote: It's hard to get that real good feeling about festivals sometimes.
author: Meg White

quote: Each of us has a vision of good and of evil. We have to encourage people to move towards what they think is good... Everyone has his own idea of good and evil and must choose to follow the good and fight evil as he conceives them. That would be enough to make the world a better place.
author: Pope Francis

quote: Despite everything, I believe that people are really good at heart.
author: Anne Frank

quote: Sorrow can be alleviated by good sleep, a bath and a glass of wine.
author: Thomas Aquinas

quote: A good financial plan is a road map that shows us exactly how the choices we make today will affect our future.
author: Alexa Von Tobel

quote: Good judgment comes from experience, and a lot of that comes from bad judgment.
author: Will Rogers

quote: There's nothing more important than our good health - that's our principal capital asset.
author: Arlen Specter

quote: Great ambition is the passion of a great character. Those endowed with it may perform very good or very bad acts. All depends on the principles which direct them.
author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: Money doesn't mean anything to me. I've made a lot of money, but I want to enjoy life and not stress myself building my bank account. I give lots away and live simply, mostly out of a suitcase in hotels. We all know that good health is much more important.
author: Keanu Reeves

quote: Don't be afraid to be awesome. Sometimes being weird and different is good. When you think you're working hard, there is always someone else working harder, so always be yourself and know your stuff.
author: Jacqueline MacInnes Wood

quote: A garden requires patient labor and attention. Plants do not grow merely to satisfy ambitions or to fulfill good intentions. They thrive because someone expended effort on them.
author: Liberty Hyde Bailey

quote: Social media has given us this idea that we should all have a posse of friends when in reality, if we have one or two really good friends, we are lucky.
author: Brene Brown

quote: My trust in God flows out of the experience of his loving me, day in and day out, whether the day is stormy or fair, whether I'm sick or in good health, whether I'm in a state of grace or disgrace. He comes to me where I live and loves me as I am.
author: Brennan Manning

quote: Do your little bit of good where you are it's those little bits of good put together that overwhelm the world.
author: Desmond Tutu

quote: Win or lose, I'll feel good about myself. That's what is important.
author: Mary Docter

quote: All tyranny needs to gain a foothold is for people of good conscience to remain silent.
author: Edmund Burke

quote: I define a 'good person' as somebody who is fully conscious of their own limitations. They know their strengths, but they also know their 'shadow' - they know their weaknesses. In other words, they understand that there is no good without bad. Good and evil are really one, but we have broken them up in our consciousness. We polarize them.
author: John Bradshaw

quote: Turn off your email; turn off your phone; disconnect from the Internet; figure out a way to set limits so you can concentrate when you need to, and disengage when you need to. Technology is a good servant but a bad master.
author: Gretchen Rubin

quote: Marriage is good for those who are afraid to sleep alone at night.
author: St. Jerome

quote: Unless you have bad times, you can't appreciate the good times.
author: Joe Torre

quote: It turns out that advancing equal opportunity and economic empowerment is both morally right and good economics, because discrimination, poverty and ignorance restrict growth, while investments in education, infrastructure and scientific and technological research increase it, creating more good jobs and new wealth for all of us.
author: William J. Clinton

quote: Good health is not something we can buy. However, it can be an extremely valuable savings account.
author: Anne Wilson Schaef

quote: Do all the good you can, by all the means you can, in all the ways you can, in all the places you can, at all the times you can, to all the people you can, as long as ever you can.
author: John Wesley

quote: By all means, marry. If you get a good wife, you'll become happy; if you get a bad one, you'll become a philosopher.
author: Socrates

quote: All I'm trying to do is survive and make good out of the dirty, nasty, unbelievable lifestyle that they gave me.
author: Tupac Shakur

quote: My childhood, I wouldn't say it was bad. It helped me grow up. I stayed out of trouble. My parents taught me what's wrong and right, and knowing that I had a little brother following me, I had to make sure I was doing the right thing so he knows what's right, too. I was in the house nine days out of 10. There wasn't nothing good outside for me.
author: Russell Westbrook

quote: When one has not had a good father, one must create one.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: I don't want to be too proud, but I have a good personal style.
author: Alexander McQueen

quote: I think there should be a good balance between being a good student and being able to enjoy your high school life.
author: Vanessa Lachey

quote: The battleline between good and evil runs through the heart of every man.
author: Aleksandr Solzhenitsyn

quote: The great thing about getting older is that you become more mellow. Things aren't as black and white, and you become much more tolerant. You can see the good in things much more easily rather than getting enraged as you used to do when you were young.
author: Maeve Binchy

quote: A film is never really good unless the camera is an eye in the head of a poet.
author: Orson Welles

quote: No man is good enough to govern another man without the other's consent.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: I think a gentleman is someone who holds the comfort of other people above their own. The instinct to do that is inside every good man, I believe. The rules about opening doors and buying dinner and all of that other 'gentleman' stuff is a chess game, especially these days.
author: Anna Kendrick

quote: I live a very joyful life, with a lot of laughter and good times.
author: Kimberly Elise

quote: The more you are positive and say, 'I want to have a good life,' the more you build that reality for yourself by creating the life that you want.
author: Chris Pine

quote: I put a lot of pressure on myself. I think something's not good enough, and I won't stop until I feel like I've made it. I'm never satisfied.
author: J. Cole

quote: My idea of a good night has always been having a lovely meal and a proper conversation.
author: Kirsty Gallacher

quote: Inspiration comes from within yourself. One has to be positive. When you're positive, good things happen.
author: Deep Roy

quote: Good things are associated with blue, like clear days, more than singing the blues. Just the word 'blue' in the singular is full of optimism and positive connotation to most people.
author: David Carson

quote: Nostalgia is a file that removes the rough edges from the good old days.
author: Doug Larson

quote: It is not enough to have a good mind the main thing is to use it well.
author: Rene Descartes

quote: Doing Good is a simple and universal vision. A vision to which each and every one of us can connect and contribute to its realisation. A vision based on the belief that by doing good deeds, positive thinking and affirmative choice of words, feelings and actions, we can enhance goodness in the world.
author: Shari Arison

quote: Treat those who are good with goodness, and also treat those who are not good with goodness. Thus goodness is attained. Be honest to those who are honest, and be also honest to those who are not honest. Thus honesty is attained.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: My idea of good company is the company of clever, well-informed people who have a great deal of conversation; that is what I call good company.
author: Jane Austen

quote: A man is born alone and dies alone and he experiences the good and bad consequences of his karma alone and he goes alone to hell or the Supreme abode.
author: Chanakya

quote: When you take care of yourself, you're a better person for others. When you feel good about yourself, you treat others better.
author: Solange Knowles

quote: Today or any day that phone may ring and bring good news.
author: Ethel Waters

quote: I have learned that there is more power in a good strong hug than in a thousand meaningful words.
author: Ann Hood

quote: The crest and crowning of all good, Life's final star, is brotherhood.
author: Edwin Markham

quote: Your net worth to the world is usually determined by what remains after your bad habits are subtracted from your good ones.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Painting is self-discovery. Every good artist paints what he is.
author: Jackson Pollock

quote: The power for creating a better future is contained in the present moment: You create a good future by creating a good present.
author: Eckhart Tolle

quote: In tragedy, it's hard to find a good resolution; it's not black and white: it's a big fog of gray.
author: Paul Dano

quote: When you open your heart to patriotism, there is no room for prejudice. The Bible tells us, 'How good and pleasant it is when God's people live together in unity.'
author: Donald Trump

quote: I think one of the keys to leadership is recognizing that everybody has gifts and talents. A good leader will learn how to harness those gifts toward the same goal.
author: Ben Carson

quote: I'm just thankful I'm surrounded by good people.
author: Jon Pardi

quote: My philosophy is: Life is hard, but God is good. Try not to confuse the two.
author: Anne F. Beiler

quote: The only thing to do with good advice is to pass it on. It is never of any use to oneself.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Talking isn't doing. It is a kind of good deed to say well and yet words are not deeds.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: He that is good for making excuses is seldom good for anything else.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: History isn't just the story of bad people doing bad things. It's quite as much a story of people trying to do good things. But somehow, something goes wrong.
author: C. S. Lewis

quote: There is a cult of ignorance in the United States, and there has always been. The strain of anti-intellectualism has been a constant thread winding its way through our political and cultural life, nurtured by the false notion that democracy means that my ignorance is just as good as your knowledge.
author: Isaac Asimov

quote: It is better to be beautiful than to be good. But... it is better to be good than to be ugly.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: A good leader can engage in a debate frankly and thoroughly, knowing that at the end he and the other side must be closer, and thus emerge stronger. You don't have that idea when you are arrogant, superficial, and uninformed.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: Sustainability is no longer about doing less harm. It's about doing more good.
author: Jochen Zeitz

quote: The good part about getting older is you stop trying to prove anything to anyone, including yourself. All you are in the pursuit of is collecting experiences - beautiful, fragile little soap bubbles that you store in your heart, and every once in a while you pull one out and gaze at the delicate pictures it shows you.
author: Twinkle Khanna

quote: Any tool can be used for good or bad. It's really the ethics of the artist using it.
author: John Knoll

quote: A good commander is benevolent and unconcerned with fame.
author: Sun Tzu

quote: We want to do a lot of stuff we're not in great shape. We didn't get a good night's sleep. We're a little depressed. Coffee solves all these problems in one delightful little cup.
author: Jerry Seinfeld

quote: Good night, and good luck.
author: Edward R. Murrow

quote: We are all ready to be savage in some cause. The difference between a good man and a bad one is the choice of the cause.
author: William James

quote: Our doubts are traitors and make us lose the good we oft might win by fearing to attempt.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: All the money in the world can't buy you back good health.
author: Reba McEntire

quote: No matter what happens in life, be good to people. Being good to people is a wonderful legacy to leave behind.
author: Taylor Swift

quote: Be grateful for what you have and stop complaining - it bores everybody else, does you no good, and doesn't solve any problems.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Riding a motorcycle on today's highways, you have to ride in a very defensive manner. You have to be a good rider and you have to have both hands and both feet on the controls at all times.
author: Evel Knievel

quote: Sure, I can get a little bit jealous. The good part about jealousy is that it comes from passion. It's also the dangerous part and it's an ugly emotion that hurts.
author: Matthew McConaughey

quote: I think we consider too much the good luck of the early bird and not enough the bad luck of the early worm.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: It is painful to watch children trying to show off for parents who are engrossed in their cell phones. Children are nostalgic for the 'good old days' when parents used to read to them without the cell phone by their side or watch football games or Disney movies without having the BlackBerry handy.
author: Sherry Turkle

quote: It's good as an artist to always remember to see things in a new, weird way.
author: Tim Burton

quote: The person earning the federal minimum wage of $7.25 isn't going out to eat at restaurants. They're not taking piano lessons. They're not going to the gym or the yoga studio. They're not sending mom flowers on Mother's day. What good is this person in the economy? If you raise it to $15 an hour, they're doing all of those things.
author: Nick Hanauer

quote: If you can't make it good, at least make it look good.
author: Bill Gates

quote: Cooking is not difficult. Everyone has taste, even if they don't realize it. Even if you're not a great chef, there's nothing to stop you understanding the difference between what tastes good and what doesn't.
author: Gerard Depardieu

quote: Persuasion is achieved by the speaker's personal character when the speech is so spoken as to make us think him credible. We believe good men more fully and more readily than others: this is true generally whatever the question is, and absolutely true where exact certainty is impossible and opinions are divided.
author: Aristotle

quote: We are all human beings, and we all have insecurities, but it's about being healthy and happy with yourself. I'm not perfect, and I will indulge in pizza and sweets on occasion. The goal is to make the majority of your decisions good for your body. So listen to your body, and treat it like your temple.
author: Jacqueline MacInnes Wood

quote: Good artists copy, great artists steal.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: A cute outfit can really make your day. If I wear something I look good in, my mood just goes way up.
author: Jennette McCurdy

quote: I understand that I'm not perfect. I made mistakes and I had a hand in everything that's happened to me, good and bad.
author: Dwyane Wade

quote: The evil that is in the world almost always comes of ignorance, and good intentions may do as much harm as malevolence if they lack understanding.
author: Albert Camus

quote: There are good and bad times, but our mood changes more often than our fortune.
author: Thomas Carlyle

quote: If there were no bad people, there would be no good lawyers.
author: Charles Dickens

quote: The sad truth is that most evil is done by people who never make up their minds to be good or evil.
author: Hannah Arendt

quote: If you're happy, if you're feeling good, then nothing else matters.
author: Robin Wright

quote: It's good to trust others but, not to do so is much better.
author: Benito Mussolini

quote: The good and bad things are what form us as people... change makes us grow.
author: Kate Winslet

quote: Elegance is usually confused with superficiality, fashion, lack of depth. This is a serious mistake: human beings need to have elegance in their actions and in their posture because this word is synonymous with good taste, amiability, equilibrium and harmony.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: I believe that every human mind feels pleasure in doing good to another.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: You must never be satisfied with losing. You must get angry, terribly angry, about losing. But the mark of the good loser is that he takes his anger out on himself and not his victorious opponents or on his teammates.
author: Richard M. Nixon

quote: It's also selfish because it makes you feel good when you help others. I've been helped by acts of kindness from strangers. That's why we're here, after all, to help others.
author: Carol Burnett

quote: Good design is making something intelligible and memorable. Great design is making something memorable and meaningful.
author: Dieter Rams

quote: Fighting corruption is not just good governance. It's self-defense. It's patriotism.
author: Joe Biden

quote: Climb the mountains and get their good tidings.
author: John Muir

quote: A good motto is: use friendliness but do not use your friends.
author: Frank Crane

quote: I am convinced that material things can contribute a lot to making one's life pleasant, but, basically, if you do not have very good friends and relatives who matter to you, life will be really empty and sad and material things cease to be important.
author: David Rockefeller

quote: The purpose of education is to make good human beings with skill and expertise... Enlightened human beings can be created by teachers.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: A cigar is as good as memories that you have when you smoked it.
author: Raul Julia

quote: Nobody, man or woman, has ever wrecked a good marriage.
author: Jimmy Dean

quote: Anyone can have a good day, but you have to be able to perform on a bad day.
author: Jurgen Klopp

quote: Since you cannot do good to all, you are to pay special attention to those who, by the accidents of time, or place, or circumstances, are brought into closer connection with you.
author: Saint Augustine

quote: I have good and bad days like everyone else. I just try to be positive and surround myself with great people. When I think about all the great things and people I have had in my life, that gives me confidence.
author: Jessica White

quote: A man always has two reasons for doing anything: a good reason and the real reason.
author: J. P. Morgan

quote: Good news is rare these days, and every glittering ounce of it should be cherished and hoarded and worshipped and fondled like a priceless diamond.
author: Hunter S. Thompson

quote: The good old days, when each idea had an owner, are gone forever.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: Shame is the most powerful, master emotion. It's the fear that we're not good enough.
author: Brene Brown

quote: Your grammar is a reflection of your image. Good or bad, you have made an impression. And like all impressions, you are in total control.
author: Jeffrey Gitomer

quote: Being entirely honest with oneself is a good exercise.
author: Sigmund Freud

quote: Life moves so fast. You gotta document the good times, man.
author: Big Boi

quote: I don't know how to live good. I only know how to suffer.
author: Bob Marley

quote: There is only one difference between a long life and a good dinner: that, in the dinner, the sweets come last.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: I enjoy life when things are happening. I don't care if it's good things or bad things. That means you're alive.
author: Joan Rivers

quote: No man succeeds without a good woman behind him. Wife or mother, if it is both, he is twice blessed indeed.
author: Godfrey Winn

quote: That's the good thing about being president, I can do whatever I want.
author: Barack Obama

quote: It's good to be selfish. But not so self-centered that you never listen to other people.
author: Hugh Hefner

quote: If it tastes really good, and it's funky, it's funkalicous. If the guy making it is funky, he's funkintacious.
author: Guy Fieri

quote: Goodness is something that makes us serene and content it is magnificent. Those who are not good are evil.
author: Bhumibol Adulyadej

quote: I'm convinced of this: Good done anywhere is good done everywhere. For a change, start by speaking to people rather than walking by them like they're stones that don't matter. As long as you're breathing, it's never too late to do some good.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: The only freedom which deserves the name is that of pursuing our own good, in our own way, so long as we do not attempt to deprive others of theirs, or impede their efforts to obtain it.
author: John Stuart Mill

quote: I intend to live forever. So far, so good.
author: Steven Wright

quote: Whenever a doctor cannot do good, he must be kept from doing harm.
author: Hippocrates

quote: Little League baseball is a very good thing because it keeps the parents off the streets.
author: Yogi Berra

quote: I try to keep in my mind the simple question: Am I trying to do good or make myself look good? Too many of our responsibilities get added to our plate when we are trying to please people, impress people, prove ourselves, acquire power, increase our prestige. All those motivations are about looking good more than doing good.
author: Kevin DeYoung

quote: Expressions of affection, like putting your arm around someone's shoulder, holding hands, or giving a kiss good night, involve the principle of honesty.
author: John Bytheway

quote: I believe that God knows what each of us wants and needs. It's not necessary for us to make it to church on Sunday to reach Him. You can find Him anyplace. And if that sounds heretical, my source is pretty good: Matthew, Five to Seven, The Sermon on the Mount.
author: Frank Sinatra

quote: I firmly believe that any man's finest hour, the greatest fulfillment of all that he holds dear, is that moment when he has worked his heart out in a good cause and lies exhausted on the field of battle - victorious.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: My daughter is the biggest gift; I've said it so many times and it sounds like a cliche, but the thing about being a parent is when you think you've cracked it, and you're on top of your game, they change again and you have to catch up and adjust. I feel such a responsibility to instill good values in her, to be polite, to have discipline.
author: Geri Halliwell

quote: A nice person is a 'yes' person, whereas a good person is a person who accepts their responsibility in things and moves forward and tries to constantly evolve and isn't afraid to say no or challenge someone or be honest or truthful.
author: Miranda Kerr

quote: What is interesting is the power and the impact of social media... So we must try to use social media in a good way.
author: Malala Yousafzai

quote: Being a good listener is absolutely critical to being a good leader you have to listen to the people who are on the front line.
author: Richard Branson

quote: People tend to dwell more on negative things than on good things. So the mind then becomes obsessed with negative things, with judgments, guilt and anxiety produced by thoughts about the future and so on.
author: Eckhart Tolle

quote: As any doctor can tell you, the most crucial step toward healing is having the right diagnosis. If the disease is precisely identified, a good resolution is far more likely. Conversely, a bad diagnosis usually means a bad outcome, no matter how skilled the physician.
author: Andrew Weil

quote: There is no such thing as bad weather, only different kinds of good weather.
author: John Ruskin

quote: Well, there's nothing better than putting your feet up on a Sunday afternoon and grabbing a good book.
author: Chris Klein

quote: Sleeping is like meditation: it's good to rest the body but also to shut the mind down for a bit.
author: Anthony Joshua

quote: Resilience is accepting your new reality, even if it's less good than the one you had before.
author: Elizabeth Edwards

quote: It takes more than just a good looking body. You've got to have the heart and soul to go with it.
author: Epictetus

quote: All good things which exist are the fruits of originality.
author: John Stuart Mill

quote: The evil that men do lives after them the good is oft interred with their bones.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Our higher education system is one of the things that makes America exceptional. There's no place else that has the assets we do when it comes to higher education. People from all over the world aspire to come here and study here. And that is a good thing.
author: Barack Obama

quote: We all have the duty to do good.
author: Pope Francis

quote: No matter what has happened to you in the past or what is going on in your life right now, it has no power to keep you from having an amazingly good future if you will walk by faith in God. God loves you! He wants you to live with victory over sin so you can possess His promises for your life today!
author: Joyce Meyer

quote: Thanksgiving Day is a good day to recommit our energies to giving thanks and just giving.
author: Amy Grant

quote: I wake up every day and I think, 'I'm breathing! It's a good day.'
author: Eve Ensler

quote: Good friends don't have to visit each other every day.
author: Juan Manuel Santos

quote: I tried to drown my sorrows, but the bastards learned how to swim, and now I am overwhelmed by this decent and good feeling.
author: Frida Kahlo

quote: Doing good holds the power to transform us on the inside, and then ripple out in ever-expanding circles that positively impact the world at large.
author: Shari Arison

quote: You're only as good as your last haircut.
author: Fran Lebowitz

quote: A good mustache makes a man for many reasons.
author: John Oates

quote: If I play a villain, I try to find his lightness and his good side. And if I play a hero or a good guy, I'll try to find his darkness or his flaws. Because I don't believe in good and evil. I believe in grays.
author: Joel Kinnaman

quote: I'm very happy with my life. I am what I am. I don't worry about anything that I can't control. That's a really good lesson in life.
author: Tom Watson

quote: You have good days, you have bad days. But the main thing is to grow mentally.
author: Floyd Mayweather, Jr.

quote: Sometimes we look back and 10 years from now we think, 'Boy, those were great old days.' Well, you know, we're living in the good old days.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: A good fragrance should have a certain personality that makes people identify the scent with you.
author: Shakira

quote: The true measure of a man is how he treats someone who can do him absolutely no good.
author: Samuel Johnson

quote: To be a good loser is to learn how to win.
author: Carl Sandburg

quote: Being a good person begins with being a wise person. Then, when you follow your conscience, will you be headed in the right direction.
author: Antonin Scalia

quote: What I wear is a reflection of where I am going and how I am feeling. If I'm in a good mood, it's got to be cashmere and jeans - just something comfy, soft and warm. When I'm down, I might find something that I haven't worn for a while that was bought for me - or wear a brooch or a pair of shoes that are like old friends.
author: Kim Cattrall

quote: Chocolate is the first luxury. It has so many things wrapped up in it: Deliciusness in the moment, childhood memories, and that grin-inducing feeling of getting a reward for being good.
author: Mariska Hargitay

quote: English language is the most universal language in history, way more than the Latin of Julius Caesar. It's the most punderful language because its vocabulary has a certain critical mass that makes a lingo good for punning.
author: Richard Lederer

quote: Live fast, die young, and leave a good looking corpse.
author: John Derek

quote: Be true to the game, because the game will be true to you. If you try to shortcut the game, then the game will shortcut you. If you put forth the effort, good things will be bestowed upon you. That's truly about the game, and in some ways that's about life too.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: A good photograph is knowing where to stand.
author: Ansel Adams

quote: The general who advances without coveting fame and retreats without fearing disgrace, whose only thought is to protect his country and do good service for his sovereign, is the jewel of the kingdom.
author: Sun Tzu

quote: Bad news travels at the speed of light good news travels like molasses.
author: Tracy Morgan

quote: I'm a hacker, but I'm the good kind of hackers. And I've never been a criminal.
author: Mikko Hypponen

quote: The power of choosing good and evil is within the reach of all.
author: Origen

quote: My motto is: more good times.
author: Jack Nicholson

quote: You're going to struggle. You're going to do well. You can't really let the past or the day before - whether you had a good day or bad day - dictate the day you have that certain day.
author: Andrew Benintendi

quote: Every good act is charity. A man's true wealth hereafter is the good that he does in this world to his fellows.
author: Moliere

quote: The universe works in crazy ways. Your good luck will come in waves, and so does your bad, so you have to take the good with the bad and press forward.
author: Nick Cummins

quote: Honest disagreement is often a good sign of progress.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Sometimes I'm so tired, I look down at what I'm wearing, and if it's comfortable enough to sleep in, I don't even make it into my pajamas. I'm looking down, and I'm like, 'T-shirt and stretchy pants? Yup, that's fine. It's pajama-y, good night.'
author: Rebecca Romijn

quote: How great are the dangers I face to win a good name in Athens.
author: Alexander the Great

quote: History will have to record that the greatest tragedy of this period of social transition was not the strident clamor of the bad people, but the appalling silence of the good people.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: Distance is a bad excuse for not having a good relationship with somebody. It's the determination to keep it going or let it fall by the wayside that's the real reason that the relationships continue.
author: James McAvoy

quote: I really do encourage other manufacturers to bring electric cars to market. It's a good thing, and they need to bring it to market and keep iterating and improving and make better and better electric cars, and that's what going to result in humanity achieving a sustainable transport future. I wish it was growing faster than it is.
author: Elon Musk

quote: It is the greatest good to the greatest number of people which is the measure of right and wrong.
author: Jeremy Bentham

quote: Good can exist without evil, whereas evil cannot exist without good.
author: Thomas Aquinas

quote: In order to be rated as good as a good man in the field of her earnings, she must show herself better than he. She must be more steady, or more trustworthy, or more skilled, or more cheap in order to have the same chance of employment.
author: Florence Kelley

quote: We forget just how painfully dim the world was before electricity. A candle, a good candle, provides barely a hundredth of the illumination of a single 100 watt light bulb.
author: Bill Bryson

quote: Tennis is mostly mental. Of course, you must have a lot of physical skill, but you can't play tennis well and not be a good thinker. You win or lose the match before you even go out there.
author: Venus Williams

quote: To me, integrity means always doing what is right and good, regardless of the immediate consequences. It means being righteous from the very depth of our soul, not only in our actions but, more importantly, in our thoughts and in our hearts.
author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quote: To be a good citizen, it's important to be able to put yourself in other people's shoes and see the big picture. If everything you see is rooted in your own identity, that becomes difficult or impossible.
author: Eli Pariser

quote: Manners are a sensitive awareness of the feelings of others. If you have that awareness, you have good manners, no matter what fork you use.
author: Emily Post

quote: Good things happen when you meet strangers.
author: Yo-Yo Ma

quote: You can live your life angry, bitter, mad at somebody or even guilty, not letting go of your own mistakes, but you won't receive the good things God has in store.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: What greater bliss than to look back on days spent in usefulness, in doing good to those around us.
author: Dorothea Dix

quote: Leadership is hard to define and good leadership even harder. But if you can get people to follow you to the ends of the earth, you are a great leader.
author: Indra Nooyi

quote: Summer means happy times and good sunshine. It means going to the beach, going to Disneyland, having fun.
author: Brian Wilson

quote: The aim of a college education is to teach you to know a good man when you see one.
author: William James

quote: Goodness is the only investment that never fails.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Paris is always a good idea.
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: And I believe that good journalism, good television, can make our world a better place.
author: Christiane Amanpour

quote: Good advice is always certain to be ignored, but that's no reason not to give it.
author: Agatha Christie

quote: There are good leaders who actively guide and bad leaders who actively misguide. Hence, leadership is about persuasion, presentation and people skills.
author: Shiv Khera

quote: Non-cooperation with evil is as much a duty as is cooperation with good.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: I must say I find television very educational. The minute somebody turns it on, I go to the library and read a good book.
author: Groucho Marx

quote: Be true to yourself. Make each day a masterpiece. Help others. Drink deeply from good books. Make friendship a fine art. Build a shelter against a rainy day.
author: John Wooden

quote: What I dream of is an art of balance, of purity and serenity devoid of troubling or depressing subject matter - a soothing, calming influence on the mind, rather like a good armchair which provides relaxation from physical fatigue.
author: Henri Matisse

quote: I just like playing songs with happy vibes and good feelings.
author: Kygo

quote: To be a good actor you have to be something like a criminal, to be willing to break the rules to strive for something new.
author: Nicolas Cage

quote: The only good luck many great men ever had was being born with the ability and determination to overcome bad luck.
author: Channing Pollock

quote: Cause I'm a musician, I'm not really good at posing and being a model, like, modeling.
author: Amy Winehouse

quote: The first question which the priest and the Levite asked was: 'If I stop to help this man, what will happen to me?' But... the good Samaritan reversed the question: 'If I do not stop to help this man, what will happen to him?'
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: You can't change the world alone - you will need some help - and to truly get from your starting point to your destination takes friends, colleagues, the good will of strangers and a strong coxswain to guide them.
author: William H. McRaven

quote: My idea of Heaven is to wake up, have a good breakfast, and spend the rest of the day drawing.
author: Peter Falk

quote: Life is abundant, and life is beautiful. And it's a good place that we're all in, you know, on this earth, if we take care of it.
author: Alice Walker

quote: Some of my happiest moments are the ones I spend with my husband, a few close relatives, and a handful of very good friends who know me well and like me anyway.
author: Robin Marantz Henig

quote: Most good programmers do programming not because they expect to get paid or get adulation by the public, but because it is fun to program.
author: Linus Torvalds

quote: Good governance with good intentions is the hallmark of our government. Implementation with integrity is our core passion.
author: Narendra Modi

quote: The secret of a good life is to have the right loyalties and hold them in the right scale of values.
author: Norman Thomas

quote: If I don't laugh at least 20 times a day - it hasn't been a good day.
author: Jordin Sparks

quote: You're in pretty good shape for the shape you are in.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: Thinking good thoughts is not enough, doing good deeds is not enough, seeing others follow your good examples is enough.
author: Douglas Horton

quote: We have a powerful potential in out youth, and we must have the courage to change old ideas and practices so that we may direct their power toward good ends.
author: Mary McLeod Bethune

quote: I believe that if you don't derive a deep sense of purpose from what you do, if you don't come radiantly alive several times a day, if you don't feel deeply grateful at the tremendous good fortune that has been bestowed on you, then you are wasting your life. And life is too short to waste.
author: Srikumar Rao

quote: Law is nothing other than a certain ordinance of reason for the common good, promulgated by the person who has the care of the community.
author: Thomas Aquinas

quote: Hearty laughter is a good way to jog internally without having to go outdoors.
author: Norman Cousins

quote: Not life, but good life, is to be chiefly valued.
author: Socrates

quote: Strive to find things to be thankful for, and just look for the good in who you are!
author: Bethany Hamilton

quote: Life comes from physical survival but the good life comes from what we care about.
author: Rollo May

quote: Doing well is the result of doing good. That's what capitalism is all about.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Even in the tough times, He's still a good God.
author: Victoria Osteen

quote: Life is never fair, and perhaps it is a good thing for most of us that it is not.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Good looks are not something you earn. But as you get older, how you look is a reflection of the life you've led.
author: Diana Quick

quote: A good advertisement is one which sells the product without drawing attention to itself.
author: David Ogilvy

quote: New ideas pass through three periods: 1) It can't be done. 2) It probably can be done, but it's not worth doing. 3) I knew it was a good idea all along!
author: Arthur C. Clarke

quote: I tell students that the opportunities I had were a result of having a good educational background. Education is what allows you to stand out.
author: Ellen Ochoa

quote: It is not true that good can only follow from good and evil only from evil, but that often the opposite is true.
author: Max Weber

quote: The test of good citizenship is loyalty to country.
author: Bainbridge Colby

quote: The first requisite of a good citizen in this republic of ours is that he shall be able and willing to pull his own weight.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Fashion is about comfort and feeling good.
author: Max Azria

quote: All holidays can be good times.
author: John Clayton

quote: Good writing is supposed to evoke sensation in the reader - not the fact that it is raining, but the feeling of being rained upon.
author: E. L. Doctorow

quote: In the past the man has been first in the future the system must be first... The first object of any good system must be that of developing first class men.
author: Frederick W. Taylor

quote: Virtue is persecuted more by the wicked than it is loved by the good.
author: Buddha

quote: My legacy doesn't matter. It isn't important that I be remembered. It's important that when I stand before the Lord, he says, 'Well done, good and faithful servant.' I want to finish strong.
author: James Dobson

quote: Having a bunch of cats around is good. If you're feeling bad, you just look at the cats, you'll feel better because they know that everything is just as it is. There's nothing to get excited about. They just know. They're saviours.
author: Charles Bukowski

quote: A good farmer is nothing more nor less than a handy man with a sense of humus.
author: E. B. White

quote: We ought to do good to others as simply as a horse runs, or a bee makes honey, or a vine bears grapes season after season without thinking of the grapes it has borne.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: If I have a thousand ideas and only one turns out to be good, I am satisfied.
author: Alfred Nobel

quote: Fame itself... doesn't really afford you anything more than a good seat in a restaurant.
author: David Bowie

quote: Associate with men of good quality if you esteem your own reputation for it is better to be alone than in bad company.
author: George Washington

quote: If we don't figure out a way to create equity, real equity, of opportunity and access, to good schools, housing, health care, and decent paying jobs, we're not going to survive as a productive and healthy society.
author: Tim Wise

quote: A good essay must have this permanent quality about it; it must draw its curtain round us, but it must be a curtain that shuts us in not out.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: Every society, all government, and every kind of civil compact therefore, is or ought to be, calculated for the general good and safety of the community.
author: George Mason

quote: Good guy' or 'bad guy', hero or anti hero; doesn't matter to me, what role I play, only the character have something magical.
author: Rutger Hauer

quote: I'm happy, I'm in a good place, I'm looking forward to my future.
author: Katy Perry

quote: A good education is a foundation for a better future.
author: Elizabeth Warren

quote: Every book you pick up has its own lesson or lessons, and quite often the bad books have more to teach than the good ones.
author: Stephen King

quote: Whoever does not have a good father should procure one.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: The more tranquil a man becomes, the greater is his success, his influence, his power for good. Calmness of mind is one of the beautiful jewels of wisdom.
author: James Allen

quote: I don't have a feeling of inferiority. Never had. I'm as good as anybody, but no better.
author: Katherine Johnson

quote: To understand me, you have to meet me and be around me. And then only if I'm in a good mood - don't meet me in a bad mood.
author: Avril Lavigne

quote: I want to see how far I can go and how good I can be, whether it's in the classroom or on the football field.
author: Eric Berry

quote: Laughter is an important part of a good relationship. It's an immense achievement when you can move from your thinking that your partner is merely an idiot to thinking that they are that wonderfully complex thing called a loveable idiot. And often that means having a little bit of a sense of humour about their flaws.
author: Alain de Botton

quote: The reading of all good books is like a conversation with the finest minds of past centuries.
author: Rene Descartes

quote: A magnetic personality doesn't necessarily indicate a good heart.
author: Laura Linney

quote: My advice to anybody, including myself, is if you're going through a bad period, and you just can't see the world's on your shoulders and no day is a good day, you're missing the whole point of the experience. And that's something dogs know from the moment they come bounding up to you as a puppy.
author: W. Bruce Cameron

quote: Never call an accountant a credit to his profession a good accountant is a debit to his profession.
author: Charles Lyell

quote: There's no regret. You can't regret. I mean, I've felt regret but I've also refused to allow regret to sow a seed and live in me because I don't believe it. You feel it, it's like guilt, it's like jealousy, it's like all those horrible things. You've just got to snip them and get them out, because they're no good.
author: Jude Law

quote: Everything has become so easy. It's great that it's at your fingertips, but I miss those good old days. And we're connected, but it can be very alienating. There is this distance between all of us because we're speaking to each other through cameras and monitors and icons and Emojis.
author: Rami Malek

quote: If you think people are inherently good, you get rid of the police for 24 hours - see what happens.
author: Sylvester Stallone

quote: A good director creates an environment, which gives the actor the encouragement to fly.
author: Kevin Bacon

quote: Good seasons start with good beginnings.
author: Sparky Anderson

quote: Jealousy is both reasonable and belongs to reasonable men, while envy is base and belongs to the base, for the one makes himself get good things by jealousy, while the other does not allow his neighbour to have them through envy.
author: Aristotle

quote: I have found little that is 'good' about human beings on the whole. In my experience most of them are trash, no matter whether they publicly subscribe to this or that ethical doctrine or to none at all. That is something that you cannot say aloud, or perhaps even think.
author: Sigmund Freud

quote: Reading a book about management isn't going to make you a good manager any more than a book about guitar will make you a good guitarist, but it can get you thinking about the most important concepts.
author: Drew Houston

quote: A liar should have a good memory.
author: Quintilian

quote: Looking beautiful isn't just about what you apply on your face. It's the little things you do that matter. A combination of a good diet, exercise, healthy habits, discipline, dancing etc. is what my beauty routine consists of. Also, I have no bad habits; I don't drink or smoke. All these contribute to me being fit and looking good.
author: Madhuri Dixit

quote: True intuitive expertise is learned from prolonged experience with good feedback on mistakes.
author: Daniel Kahneman

quote: When you have a daughter, you want to protect her from the things that I've seen out there, you know, the things that's out there that ain't good for her. It's a crazy world we live in.
author: Nas

quote: A good example is far better than a good precept.
author: Dwight L. Moody

quote: Dedicate yourself to the good you deserve and desire for yourself. Give yourself peace of mind. You deserve to be happy. You deserve delight.
author: Mark Victor Hansen

quote: I think one of the most important things in a relationship is caring for your significant other through good times and bad.
author: Nick Cannon

quote: People are always good company when they are doing what they really enjoy.
author: Samuel Butler

quote: Life is not a matter of holding good cards, but sometimes, playing a poor hand well.
author: Jack London

quote: I feel like if you're a really good human being, you can try to find something beautiful in every single person, no matter what.
author: Lady Gaga

quote: Good design begins with honesty, asks tough questions, comes from collaboration and from trusting your intuition.
author: Freeman Thomas

quote: When you begin to worry, go find something to do. Get busy being a blessing to someone; do something fruitful. Talking about your problem or sitting alone, thinking about it, does no good; it serves only to make you miserable. Above all else, remember that worrying is totally useless. Worrying will not solve your problem.
author: Joyce Meyer

quote: I actually think that the most efficacious way of making a difference is to lead by example, and doing random acts of kindness is setting a very good example of how to behave in the world.
author: Misha Collins

quote: For me, life is about experience and being a good person.
author: Chris Hemsworth

quote: Fun is good.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: What do I think of Western civilization? I think it would be a very good idea.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: People change over the years, and that changes situations for good and for bad.
author: Bobby Knight

quote: Less is only more where more is no good.
author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quote: They didn't want it good, they wanted it Wednesday.
author: Robert A. Heinlein

quote: Being a good leader requires remembering that you're there for a reason, and the reason certainly isn't to have your way. High-integrity leaders not only welcome questioning and criticism - they insist on it.
author: Travis Bradberry

quote: No matter how busy I get or how much pressure is on my shoulders, a good workout makes me feel at ease. I come off the treadmill feeling relaxed, full of joy and with a sense of perspective over the issues on my plate.
author: Robin S. Sharma

quote: I am in politics because of the conflict between good and evil, and I believe that in the end good will triumph.
author: Margaret Thatcher

quote: Rather than dividing the world between good and evil, the Left divided the world in terms of economics. Economic classes, not moral values, explained human behavior. Therefore, to cite a common example, poverty, not one's moral value system, or lack of it, caused crime.
author: Dennis Prager

quote: I am confident that, in the end, common sense and justice will prevail. I'm an optimist, brought up on the belief that if you wait to the end of the story, you get to see the good people live happily ever after.
author: Cat Stevens

quote: None of Us is as Good as All of Us.
author: Ray Kroc

quote: Associate yourself with people of good quality, for it is better to be alone than in bad company.
author: Booker T. Washington

quote: I am like the sick sheep that strays from the rest of the flock. Unless the Good Shepherd takes me on His shoulders and carries me back to His fold, my steps will falter, and in the very effort of rising, my feet will give way.
author: St. Jerome

quote: When you have a dark side, nothing is ever as good as it seems.
author: Pink

quote: Twice and thrice over, as they say, good is it to repeat and review what is good.
author: Plato

quote: I think life is a matter of choices and that wherever we are, good or bad, is because of choices we make.
author: Lou Holtz

quote: The good thing about flying solo is it's never boring.
author: Steve Fossett

quote: There are going to be good times and bad times, but lighten up.
author: Chris Pine

quote: There's nothing wrong with being a loser, it just depends on how good you are at it.
author: Billie Joe Armstrong

quote: Destiny is a good thing to accept when it's going your way. When it isn't, don't call it destiny; call it injustice, treachery, or simple bad luck.
author: Joseph Heller

quote: Great champions have an enormous sense of pride. The people who excel are those who are driven to show the world and prove to themselves just how good they are.
author: Nancy Lopez

quote: Just knowing you don't have the answers is a recipe for humility, openness, acceptance, forgiveness, and an eagerness to learn - and those are all good things.
author: Dick Van Dyke

quote: When you realize who the good people are in your life, you're so lucky.
author: Sophia Bush

quote: I can live for two months on a good compliment.
author: Mark Twain

quote: There is a fine line between censorship and good taste and moral responsibility.
author: Steven Spielberg

quote: Animals praise a good day, a good hunt. They praise rain if they're thirsty. That's prayer. They don't live an unconscious life, they simply have no language to talk about these things. But they are grateful for the good things that come along.
author: Mary Oliver

quote: If a great outfit gets you one step closer to feeling good about yourself, then it's worth every penny.
author: Rachel Roy

quote: I think sometimes in life we want to ignore the problems of society and just think about the good. I believe in positive thinking and affirmative living, I also think it's really important to remember all of our disenfranchised members of society.
author: Kerry Washington

quote: The fact is that people are good, Give people affection and security, and they will give affection and be secure in their feelings and their behavior.
author: Abraham Maslow

quote: A hard beginning maketh a good ending.
author: John Heywood

quote: Good character consists of recognizing the selfishness that inheres in each of us and trying to balance it against the altruism to which we should all aspire. It is a difficult balance to strike, but no definition of goodness can be complete without it.
author: Alan Dershowitz

quote: God is good for everybody. The sun shines on good people and bad people, and it rains on both, too. God doesn't choose rain only for bad people.
author: Mariano Rivera

quote: Luck is everything... My good luck in life was to be a really frightened person. I'm fortunate to be a coward, to have a low threshold of fear, because a hero couldn't make a good suspense film.
author: Alfred Hitchcock

quote: Be not simply good - be good for something.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: The more we come out and do good to others, the more our hearts will be purified, and God will be in them.
author: Swami Vivekananda

quote: The definition of a good mathematical problem is the mathematics it generates rather than the problem itself.
author: Andrew Wiles

quote: To be doing good deeds is man's most glorious task.
author: Sophocles

quote: You'll find boredom where there is the absence of a good idea.
author: Earl Nightingale

quote: I believe, I believe every day is a good day when you paint.
author: Bob Ross

quote: A long healthy life is no accident. It begins with good genes, but it also depends on good habits.
author: Dan Buettner

quote: Well, you need the villain. If you don't have a villain, the good guy can stay home.
author: Christoph Waltz

quote: If you are the person who gets the lion's share of attention in good times, guess what: you get the lion's share of attention in bad times.
author: Matt Lauer

quote: No man is so foolish but he may sometimes give another good counsel, and no man so wise that he may not easily err if he takes no other counsel than his own. He that is taught only by himself has a fool for a master.
author: Hunter S. Thompson

quote: Photography is like a moment, an instant. You need a half-second to get the photo. So it's good to capture people when they are themselves.
author: Patrick Demarchelier

quote: The good inside of all of us is wrapped in a layer of apathy, and we forget how much potential we have within us, in each and every one of us, to change the world for the better for ourselves and our children, and thus to bring about oneness.
author: Shari Arison

quote: I went further on less talent than anyone, but I was a damned good entertainer.
author: Jimmy Dean

quote: You punch me, I punch back. I do not believe it's good for one's self-respect to be a punching bag.
author: Ed Koch

quote: People don't want to go to the dump and have a picnic, they want to go out to a beautiful place and enjoy their day. And so I think our job is to try to take the environment, take what the good Lord has given us, and expand upon it or enhance it, without destroying it.
author: Jack Nicklaus

quote: I don't judge others. I say if you feel good with what you're doing, let your freak flag fly.
author: Sarah Jessica Parker

quote: Jogging is very beneficial. It's good for your legs and your feet. It's also very good for the ground. If makes it feel needed.
author: Charles M. Schulz

quote: Shallow understanding from people of good will is more frustrating than absolute misunderstanding from people of ill will.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: This is important: to get to know people, listen, expand the circle of ideas. The world is crisscrossed by roads that come closer together and move apart, but the important thing is that they lead towards the Good.
author: Pope Francis

quote: The underbelly of the human psyche, what is often referred to as our dark side, is the origin of every act of self-sabotage. Birthed out of shame, fear, and denial, it misdirects our good intentions and drives us to unthinkable acts of self-destruction and not-so-unbelievable acts of self-sabotage.
author: Debbie Ford

quote: Of all that is good, sublimity is supreme. Succeeding is the coming together of all that is beautiful. Furtherance is the agreement of all that is just. Perseverance is the foundation of all actions.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Old things are always in good repute, present things in disfavor.
author: Tacitus

quote: Life is good when we think it's good. Life is bad when we don't think.
author: Douglas Horton

quote: Without your health, you've got nothing going on. I thank God every day for good health.
author: Ric Flair

quote: When you train seven days a week, you need good scenery to inspire you.
author: Alistair Brownlee

quote: As you are not yet married, and as marriage is the fundamental state of life as well as the unity of the commonwealth, make up your mind whether you are called to this state. If you make up your mind to marry, do not marry merely a good wife: marry a good mother to your children.
author: Vincent McNabb

quote: The funny thing is, I'm so used to not caring what anyone says, good or bad, that unfortunately even when people say good things... I wish it made me feel good, but it doesn't.
author: Rob Zombie

quote: I wouldn't say that I am one of the greatest dancers, but I am really quite good at what I do.
author: Lady Gaga

quote: The past is our definition. We may strive with good reason to escape it, or to escape what is bad in it. But we will escape it only by adding something better to it.
author: Wendell Berry

quote: The good and the wise lead quiet lives.
author: Euripides

quote: It's good to shut up sometimes.
author: Marcel Marceau

quote: When one has the feeling of dislike for evil, when one feels tranquil, one finds pleasure in listening to good teachings; when one has these feelings and appreciates them, one is free of fear.
author: Buddha

quote: I think it matters whether someone has a good heart.
author: Elon Musk

quote: Good leaders must communicate vision clearly, creatively, and continually. However, the vision doesn't come alive until the leader models it.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: Among a great many other things that chess teaches you is to control the initial excitement you feel when you see something that looks good. It trains you to think before grabbing and to think just as objectively when you're in trouble.
author: Stanley Kubrick

quote: You have to be very, very good looking to get ahead in motion pictures.
author: Elaine Stritch

quote: The secret of a good sermon is to have a good beginning and a good ending, then having the two as close together as possible.
author: George Burns

quote: Self-awareness is the ability to take an honest look at your life without any attachment to it being right or wrong, good or bad.
author: Debbie Ford

quote: I once had a rose named after me and I was very flattered. But I was not pleased to read the description in the catalogue: no good in a bed, but fine up against a wall.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: I think every girl has a little bit of rebellion inside. It's always fun to not follow every trend and not be the perfect good girl. It's edgy to be a little rebellious.
author: Behati Prinsloo

quote: I'm a pretty good winner. I'm a terrible loser. And I rub it in pretty good when I win.
author: Tom Brady

quote: Mankind is not likely to salvage civilization unless he can evolve a system of good and evil which is independent of heaven and hell.
author: George Orwell

quote: It is no good to try to stop knowledge from going forward. Ignorance is never better than knowledge.
author: Enrico Fermi

quote: Good things do not come easy. The road is lined with pitfalls.
author: Desi Arnaz

quote: Teamwork is so important that it is virtually impossible for you to reach the heights of your capabilities or make the money that you want without becoming very good at it.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: If there's one thing I'm good at, it's gathering people together to do something fun.
author: Dave Grohl

quote: My folks were raised pure prohibitionist. They were very good people, with high moral standards - but very repressed. There was no hugging and kissing in my home.
author: Hugh Hefner

quote: Uncertainty is a very good thing: it's the beginning of an investigation, and the investigation should never end.
author: Tim Crouch

quote: Simplicity is not the goal. It is the by-product of a good idea and modest expectations.
author: Paul Rand

quote: But the real secret to lifelong good health is actually the opposite: Let your body take care of you.
author: Deepak Chopra

quote: A person is born with feelings of envy and hate. If he gives way to them, they will lead him to violence and crime, and any sense of loyalty and good faith will be abandoned.
author: Xun Kuang

quote: I like to encourage people to realize that any action is a good action if it's proactive and there is positive intent behind it.
author: Michael J. Fox

quote: If it's a good idea, go ahead and do it. It's much easier to apologize than it is to get permission.
author: Grace Hopper

quote: Honesty and integrity are absolutely essential for success in life - all areas of life. The really good news is that anyone can develop both honesty and integrity.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Life consists not in holding good cards but in playing those you hold well.
author: Josh Billings

quote: My idea of a good night out is staying in.
author: Martin Freeman

quote: My philosophy of leadership is to surround myself with good people who have ability, judgment and knowledge, but above all, a passion for service.
author: Sonny Perdue

quote: A conservative is a man with two perfectly good legs who, however, has never learned how to walk forward.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: The conscience of children is formed by the influences that surround them their notions of good and evil are the result of the moral atmosphere they breathe.
author: Jean Paul

quote: A real man loves and respects his wife and is not only a good father but a man that his kids want to call 'Daddy.'
author: Frank Abagnale

quote: The most important thing, in anything you do, is always trying your hardest, because even if you try your hardest and it's not as good as you'd hoped, you still have that sense of not letting yourself down.
author: Tom Holland

quote: A man is as good as he has to be, and a woman as bad as she dares.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: Not only must we be good, but we must also be good for something.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: When I'm good, I'm very good. But when I'm bad I'm better.
author: Mae West

quote: All human beings are commingled out of good and evil.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: The good old days are now.
author: Tom Clancy

quote: Better is the enemy of good.
author: Voltaire

quote: He who stops being better stops being good.
author: Oliver Cromwell

quote: Nothing leads to good that is not natural.
author: Friedrich Schiller

quote: It's far more impressive when others discover your good qualities without your help.
author: Judith Martin

quote: The one thing I need to leave behind is good memories.
author: Michael Landon

quote: There is nothing better than the encouragement of a good friend.
author: Katharine Butler Hathaway

quote: It's good to remember that in crises, natural crises, human beings forget for awhile their ignorances, their biases, their prejudices. For a little while, neighbors help neighbors and strangers help strangers.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: When you have a baby, when you feel his love, you feel so at peace with the world. You just want to share the good news and share how happy you feel.
author: Shakira

quote: In the final analysis, the questions of why bad things happen to good people transmutes itself into some very different questions, no longer asking why something happened, but asking how we will respond, what we intend to do now that it happened.
author: Pierre Teilhard de Chardin

quote: Hatred is gained as much by good works as by evil.
author: Niccolo Machiavelli

quote: You never realize what a good memory you have until you try to forget something.
author: Franklin P. Jones

quote: I feel grateful because I have a lot of love in my life. I found the person I'm sharing my life with. I have a good man.
author: Gisele Bundchen

quote: Every day we wake up, we have an opportunity to do some good, but there's so much bad that you have to navigate to get to the good.
author: Chesley Sullenberger

quote: It is good to be in front of the lens to appreciate more being behind the lens.
author: Carine Roitfeld

quote: The worst thing about that kind of prejudice... is that while you feel hurt and angry and all the rest of it, it feeds you self-doubt. You start thinking, perhaps I am not good enough.
author: Nina Simone

quote: The chief enemy of creativity is 'good' sense.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: Thanksgiving, man. Not a good day to be my pants.
author: Kevin James

quote: Don't get me wrong: school is good and all, but school is way too slow for me. Like, super slow. So I didn't want to go. I wanted to learn on my own with real life experiences.
author: Lil Uzi Vert

quote: One way to break up any kind of tension is good deep breathing.
author: Byron Nelson

quote: A man who is good enough to shed his blood for the country is good enough to be given a square deal afterwards.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Good enough never is.
author: Debbi Fields

quote: It is the duty of a good shepherd to shear his sheep, not to skin them.
author: Tiberius

quote: Since I don't look like every other girl, it takes a while to be okay with that. To be different. But different is good.
author: Serena Williams

quote: No man or woman can be strong, gentle, pure, and good, without the world being better for it and without someone being helped and comforted by the very existence of that goodness.
author: Phillips Brooks

quote: It just seems to be a human trait to want to protect the speech of people with whom we agree. For the First Amendment, that is not good enough. So it is really important that we protect First Amendment rights of people no matter what side of the line they are on.
author: Floyd Abrams

quote: A good villain exudes charisma and power. He has principles, though; that just gives him a level of dimension. It makes him seem to be a bit unpredictable, because he's usually deemed as some type of evil, ruthless person, and then he shows you his principles, and you don't know what to think of it.
author: Pusha T

quote: The very spring and root of honesty and virtue lie in good education.
author: Plutarch

quote: Before every show, I have to put perfume on. I know the crowd's not necessarily going to smell me, but when I smell good, I feel like I can dominate the room.
author: Rita Ora

quote: My life is good because I am not passive about it. I invest in what is real. Like real people, to do real things, for the real me.
author: Gwyneth Paltrow

quote: As long as I have my faith in God, I'm good. I know everything else is going to come.
author: Derrick Rose

quote: If you want to feel good, you have to go out and do some good.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: I'm still not aware that I'm good looking.
author: Jamie Dornan

quote: Better do a good deed near at home than go far away to burn incense.
author: Amelia Earhart

quote: Like every other good thing in this world, leisure and culture have to be paid for. Fortunately, however, it is not the leisured and the cultured who have to pay.
author: Aldous Huxley

quote: What a miserable thing life is: you're living in clover, only the clover isn't good enough.
author: Bertolt Brecht

quote: It is not good to be too free. It is not good to have everything one wants.
author: Blaise Pascal

quote: A man has to live with himself, and he should see to it that he always has good company.
